company_name: SMALL AND MEDIUM ENTERPRISE BANK OF CAMBODIA (SME)
Job Description: ** JOB OVERVIEW• Assist Head of Procurement Unit in preparing annual procurement plan and/or revised procurement plan if necessary. • Prepare bidding documents for each category of procurement based on the sample bidding documents prescribed by Ministry of Economy and Finance. • Prepare and publish notice on bidding. • Sell or provide bidding documents to those who wish to take part in the bidding process. • Receive bidding requests and provide clarifications to bidders if there is any question related to the bidding. • Prepare and manage bidding requests including any relevant documents received properly and safely stored before opening the bidding proposals. • Provide support during bid opening event where bidding requests will be opened publicly with oversight from the Procurement Committee. • Assist Head of Procurement Unit in preparing report or minutes on the opening of bidding request, price consultation, quotes or price negotiation. • Assist Head of Procurement Unit in coordinating technical assessment on bidding requests. • Assist Head of Procurement Unit in preparing a notice on contract award to the winners bidding and copied to all losing bidders. • Assist Head of Procurement Unit in drafting the contract following the regulations and sample contract prescribed by Ministry of Economy and Finance. • Assist Head of Procurement Unit in following up with the implementation of the contract by cooperating with technical officers and other relevant officers. • Coordinate with finance to facilitate payment of the contract amount to suppliers, sub-contractors or consultants. • Assist Head of Procurement Unit to prepare quarterly, semester and annual reports on procurement undertakings. • Perform other duties related as assigned by Head of Procurement Unit.
Job Requirement: ** PERSON SPECIFICATION Knowledge & Experiences• A Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration, Management, Finance, Procurement, Logistics Management or a relevant field is a distinct advantage.• 3 to 4 years of progressively responsible experience in procurement.• Knowledge of the Public Procurement or World Bank procurement procedures is highly desirable.• Good working knowledge of MS Office application (Word, Excel), email and able to easily navigate the Internet.• Khmer native and fluency in spoken and written English is a plus.** Skills & Abilities• Able to uphold and respect procurement ethics and to conduct activities with integrity.• A team player who demonstrates patience, flexibility and honesty.• A self-starter, who is able to plan and manage his/her own work, takes initiative and strives to meet deadlines.
Contact Info: Contact Information Talent Acquisition Unit HR Manager 093768111 recruitment@smebankcambodia.com.kh MEF Business Development Center, # S, OCIC Street, Phum Kien Khleang, Sangkat Chraoy Chongvar, Khan Chraoy Chongvar, Phnom Penh 093768111

Job Description:
The purpose of this role is to develop Data Integration, Datamart, BI dashboard, data analytic and report requested from CMG business units. This role must, at regular intervals interact with the IT DESIGN team and user to understand the specification.

Additional this role is also involved with planning the strategy for long-term direction towards predictive analysis capabilities and machine learning. This role has the opportunity to look into new technology that will power the future of data analytics.

•	Design, develop and modify data integration, Datamart, BI dashboard and report based on functional and system requirements according to code standards and user interface design guidelines.
•	Perform support and maintenance, modifications, and enhancements to existing data integration, Datamart and BI through development, testing, documenting, and training users.
•	Follow and contribute to ensure a consistently high-quality standard of data integration, Datamart and BI.
•	Propose and assess solutions to resolve problems, including identifying and evaluating new technologies and third-party components.
•	Be able to bridge the gap between IT and business using data analytics to assess processes, requirement and deliver data-driven reports to executives and stakeholders.
•	Give accurate rough estimations and point out dependencies between tasks.
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor or master’s degree in IT or related field. 
•	2 years of experience in data analysis, dashboard and report development.
•	Strong skills in requirement analysis, data preparation, and data virtualization.
•	Familiarity with SQL and database, data integration and Power BI skills are required for this role.
•	Experience with SQL, Microsoft SSIS, Talend, Oracle Database, SQL Server, Azure Databases, Python, R, Tableau and Advanced Microsoft Excel would be a plus.
•	Knowledge of data virtualization and analysis.
•	Knowledge of project management
•	End to end understanding of data flow life cycle (pipeline, resource capacity, database, project delivery, report).
•	Fluent in English both writing and speaking
•	Strong analytic and problem-solving skills
•	Strong communication and presentation skills
•	Strong interpersonal capabilities and ability to work cross-functionally
•	Strong leadership skills and business acumen - performance driven.
•	Creativity thinking
•	Ability to work under pressure
•	Ability to work with multiple tasks

More information
Recruiter : Ms. Sinav VEN Tel: 066 899 822 /098 555 462
**Only shortlisted candidate will be contacted.
Address : #598 Khmuonh Village, Sangkat Sangkat Khmuonh, Khan Sen Sok, Phnom Penh, Cambodia.

Job Description:
•	Handling the marketing and sales operations for achieving increased growth & profitability.
•	Identifying new streams for revenue growth & developing plans. Using sales forecasting to ensure the sale as well as profitability of services; analyzing business developments & monitoring market trends
•	Identifying prospective clients, generating business from new accounts & developing them to achieve consistent profitability. 
•	Initiating contact with potential customers for developing leads, sales & building and maintaining healthy business relations with major clientele, ensuring maximum customer satisfaction by achieving performance parameters delivery & quality norms. 
•	Maintaining cordial relations with customers to sustain the profitability of the business.
•	Setting up service level timelines and measuring performance against them and maximizing customer satisfaction level by on time delivery, monitoring customer complaints, providing efficient services. 
•	Imparting /organizing training programs for achieving pre planned business targets.
•	Leading, training & monitoring the performance of team members to ensure efficiency in sales operations and meeting of individual & group target
•	Setting sale and profitability targets for individual fleets and your team as a whole
•	Monitoring your fleets sale/service performance and demand.
•	Continuously looking for area for implementation to achieve higher efficiency and Effectiveness of sale/services and operations.
•	Weekly update and analyze total market situation / customer feedback.
•	Deal with some major customer account yourself and handle complains.
•	Maintains contact with all clients in the market area to ensure high levels of client Satisfaction.
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor’s degree in management of business administration is plus
•	Strong achiever in a target-driven role.
•	Entrepreneurial Mind-set.
•	5 Year & above experience in Business development work in Cambodia
•	In-depth knowledge of Sales & Marketing techniques and best practices.
•	Capacity to manage various projects and work to tight deadlines.
•	Excellent negotiation and leadership skills.
•	Computer literacy and English language proficiency 
•	Good knowledge of communication skill and customer focus.
•	Strong time management and result oriented.
•	Outgoing personality, confidence, hard working with positive attitude and ability to work under pressure.
•	Desire to go extra and beyond responsibilities

Job Description:
•	Assist upper-level management, Head of CC, DCEO, Managing Director.
•	Analyze data, plan storage, improve process etc.
•	Control customs affairs and the import and export process of goods
•	Familiar with customs and logistics center entry and exit customs affairs and customer service.
•	Supervise the storage system and on-site operation efficiency.
•	Follow company direction by cooperating with Senior Manager.
•	Cooperate with all operation sections and the other sections.
•	Manage custom clearance section in Head Office and other office locatio.
•	Support to control work for clearance for PPSEZ and Sihanouk Ville, Poipet Border, Bavet Border, Phnom Penh Port, when Head of Department out of office or absent.
•	Sometime do packing list and authorization.
•	When operation have special commodity, will go to check information with customs & other ministries. 
•	Share knowledge about clearance to operation and sale department.
•	Follow up with clearance when have shipment by any gate or port.
•	Prepare packing list, then apply form D, E, and customs valuation, customs permit, apply ministry of environment, and need HS Code from operation for check tariff or involve other (another) ministry.
•	 Double check on all documents which already before sent to Head of department sign and stamp.
•	Check expense claims.
•	Check C/O, customs valuation declaration
Job Requirement:
SECONDARY RESPONSIBILITIES:
•	Must has good relationship with customs policies, dry port staffs and customs officers at all gates and ports.
•	Attending the meeting with customs officers/customers.

REQUIREMENT
•	Bachelor’s degree in related field, and must have valid broker license issued by GDCE 
•	Minimum 5 years’ experience in Customs Broker, and more than 2 years’ experience of management operation department in a Customs Broker.
•	Proficient in customs affairs of air freight or sea freight or road freight or express.
•	Good command of Chinese and English for communication.
•	Strong, effective and transparent delivery of communication with different stakeholders in the organization.
•	Ability to plan for and keep track of multiple projects and deadline.
•	Good command of English proficiency – both written and spoken.
•	Good knowledge of labor practices and laws.
•	Good communication, interpersonal skills, people and analytical skills.
•	Good computer skills (Ms. Office, MS. Outlook…etc.).
•	A business-minded person with initiative and ability to work under pressure.

Benefits:
1.	Public holiday compliance to labor law
2.	AL 18 days & 7 SL
3.	Yearly salary review
4.	Phone allowance
5.	Other benefits

Job Description:
-	Perform and control the full audit cycle including risk management.
-	Financial reliability and compliance with all applicable directives and regulations.
-	Analyze and evaluate accounting documentation, previous reports, data, cash flow.
-	Prepare and present reports that reflect audit’s results and document process.
-	Act as an objective source of independent advice to ensure validity, legality and goal achievement.
-	Identify loopholes and recommend risk aversion measures and cost savings.
-	Determine internal audit scope and develop annual plans.
-	Maintain open communication with management and seek for improvement process 
-	Conduct follow up audits to monitor management’s interventions.
-	Engage to continuous knowledge development regarding the rules.
-	Keep good collaboration with other department and teamwork.
-	Reviews financial records and accounting practices to ensure an organization complies with regulations.
-	Assessing work procedures, preparing reports for senior management with recommendations on how to improve efficiency, and finding possibilities for cost savings.
-	Responsible for ensuring a company complies with its legal obligations under financial record keeping and accountancy laws.
-	Reviewing financial records, spreadsheets, and other documents to gain a thorough overview of company finances. 
-	Talking to staff members and assessing their tasks to identify areas where company operations can be made more efficient. 
-	Writing reports to summarize findings and propose changes 
-	Meeting with management to discuss their recommendations and how these can be implemented. 
-	Others tasks assign by managements.
Job Requirement:
-	Bachelor of Accounting, Finance or other related fields.
-	At least 3 years experiences in related fields.
-	Integrity, ability to keep info (such as company information) confidential.
-	Able to work independently and team under tight timelines.
-	Proven working experience as Internal Auditor or Senior Auditor  
-	Advanced computer skills on MS Office, accounting software and databases
-	Ability to manipulate large amounts of data and to compile detailed reports
-	Proven knowledge of auditing standards and procedures, laws, rules and regulations
-	High attention to detail and excellent analytical skills
-	Sound independent judgement
-	Be honest, hardworking and flexible.
-	Understanding of the government law and regulations for record-keeping and financial reporting 
-	Ability to gather relevant information about internal company practice through research and discussions with employees 
-	Ability to write concise reports based on solid evidence 
-	Ability to communicate effectively across all employee levels.

Job Description:
Taxation:
-	Prepare tax provisions schedules, returns, payments, reports and maintain a company’s tax database.
-	Find tax solutions to complicated tax issues or errors from incorrect tax filings
-	Identify legal tax savings and recommend ways to improve profits
-	Accurately prepare monthly, quarterly and annually tax reports to comply with government entity’s regulation such as GDT and MoEF
-	Maintain tax regulation and keep up to date.
-	Coordinate and deal with GDT as required. 
-	Assist Accounting/Finance Manager as required.
Fix Asset: 
-	Control and monitor company’s asset, master data and transactions including fix asset queries, purchase requisition and balance of asset.
-	Verify all assets transactions and purchase requisition posted in system. 
-	Prepare report on asset acquisition, asset disposal, deprecation, inter-company asset transfer and depreciation. 
-	Coordinate asset office with other departments to conduct asset physical count.
Job Requirement:
-	Bachelor degree of accounting and finance or related field.
-	Tax agent license from GDT is preferrable 
-	At least 2-3 years of experience in tax and asset management and/or accounting field.
-	Good command of English.
-	Knowledge in using Excel and PowerPoint, QuickBooks or other accounting software.
-	Flexible and be able to work under pressure.
-	Ability to think creatively and innovatively.
-	Good interpersonal and communication.

Job Description:
•	Develop and update HR & Admin policies, Internal Rule and Regulations, company policies, SOP and guideline to ensure HR functions are effectively and efficiently managed.
•	Ensure the recruitment and selection process: job posting, short-listing, candidate contacting, interviewing, references checking, selecting, and negotiating the offers is in accordance with the company requirement.
•	Oversee functions of HR services within company such as recruitment, hiring, employee record-keeping including contracts/ agreements, compensation, stationery, company fix assets and benefits for employees.
•	Assist departmental leaders in reviewing and updating the Job Description/ title/responsibility changes within their departments.
•	Manage to assure monthly payroll process is accurate and on time.
•	Lead and manage performance management process with all the managers to identify and address probation evaluation and annual performance appraisal of all staffs.
•	Keep track on update information from and deal with relevant government bodies: MOL, MOC, MSA, GDT, NSSF, when necessary.
•	Coordinate, prepare and deliver the training needs to staff.
•	Follow up and check all the daily-weekly-monthly report such as attendance, and other tasks related to HR & Admin department. 
•	Represent the HR department in presenting the weekly HR reports in the weekly meeting with all department leaders.
•	Check and Review on daily petty cash request for operation expenses.
•	Manage all HR operation tasks include administration organizing, office, buildings, transportation, fuel and utility, parking (vehicle), hygiene and tidy, security and safety; 
•	Generate all types of administrative letters including announcements, declarations, notifications, certifications, and memos, with tasks of editing, typing, mailing, filing and translation in both verbal and documentation.
•	Act as bridge for different departments and staff and resolve any conflicts when occurs.
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor/Master degree in Human Resource, Management or relevant field.
•	Knowledge and skills related Labor law of Cambodia such as MOC, MOL, NSSF, and have good connection with other authorities.
•	Minimum of 5 years of working experiences in human resource management.
•	Good knowledge of multiple human resources disciplines, such as talent acquisition and development, employee retention, labor relations, organizational effectiveness, compensation practices and diversity.
•	Strong, effective and transparent delivery of communication with different stakeholders in the organisation, senior management, mid managers or employees. 
•	Ability to plan for and keep track of multiple projects and deadline.
•	Strong problem solving, critical thinking and coaching.
•	Good computer skills (Ms. Office, MS. Outlook…etc.)

Job Description:
ក្នុងន័យនេះ ក្រោមថវិកាទ្រទ្រង់ពីសហគមន៍អឺរ៉ុប និងថវិកាបដិភាគរបស់រាជរដ្ឋាភិបាល, អ.គ.ហ. សូមអញ្ជើញក្រុមហ៊ុនក្នុងស្រុក ដែលមានសមត្ថភាព មានជំនាញ និងមានបទពិសោធន៍ក្នុងការ “រៀបចំគំរូកិច្ចសន្យាគម្រោងភាពជាដៃគូរវាងរដ្ឋ និង   ឯកជន ជាភាសាខ្មែរ” “Consultation Firm on the Preparation of Contract sample for Public-Private Partnership Project - Khmer version”។

Job Description:
•	Supports the development and implementation of operational plans, standard operating procedures (SOPs), initiatives and projects relating to contract compliance and supplier performance management
•	Provide guidance during contract drafting process including articulation of performance standards and Key Performance Indicators, assists in the development of technical evaluation criteria, etc.
•	Develops a quality assurance plan to provide a systematic method to monitor contract performance.
•	Develops contract compliance checklists and implementation plans.
•	Participates in the assessment of contractor performance, including advice and action to address instances of poor performance and/or non-compliance with contractual obligations.
•	Ensures the enforcement of Carlsberg Group Supplier and Licensee Code of Conduct for all contracts with suppliers.
•	Drafts relevant audit responses on contract management related issues, as required.
•	Maintains electronic and hardcopy files and records to ensure proper accountability.
•	Consolidate supplier performance evaluation result base on require timeline
•	Performs other related duties as required
Job Requirement:
•	Knowledge of supply operations, practices, and contract management.
•	Ability to specify business rules in the specific supply area. 
•	High level of integrity & positive work ethics
•	Experience in brewing company
•	Technical knowledge & understanding of category specifications
•	Good negotiation and problem-solving skills 
•	Ability to plan & communicate effectively with all levels
•	Ability to work independently and as part of a dynamic team
•	Working under pressure
•	Be faster and flexible

job title: Administrative Support Officer for Honorary Consul Office
company_name: Belt Road Capital Management (Cambodia) Co., Ltd
position: Administrative Support Officer for Honorary Consul Office
Job Description: Job SummaryAs an Administrative Support Officer for the Honorary Consul Office of Cyprus, the role involves providing essential support to the Consular officers and ensuring the efficient operation of the office. The position is responsible for assisting with various administrative tasks related to visa applications, consular services, and general office management. The role plays a vital part in maintaining smooth communication and coordination between the Honorary Consul Office, visa applicants, and relevant authorities.What you will do•	Visa Application Support: Assist visa applicants with the application process, including providing information on required documents, fees, and processing times. Ensure that all visa applications are complete and accurate before submission to the Diplomatic Mission (or Consulate) of Cyprus.• Document Verification: Verify and review visa applicants' supporting documents to ensure they meet the necessary requirements. Liaise with applicants to request additional documents if needed and guide them through the application process.• Appointment Scheduling: Manage the appointment scheduling system for visa applicants. Coordinate with applicants to set up suitable appointment times and ensure a smooth and organized application submission process.• Office Administration: Handle general administrative tasks, such as managing incoming and outgoing correspondence, maintaining records, and organizing files related to visa applications and consular services.• Fee Collection: Collect non-refundable visa fees from applicants and ensure proper documentation and accounting of the collected fees.• Visa Status Updates: Keep visa applicants informed about the status of their applications, including any delays, additional information required, or approval/rejection notifications.• Communication: Serve as a primary point of contact for visa applicants, addressing their inquiries and providing information about visa regulations, application procedures, and other consular services.• Liaison with Authorities: Collaborate with relevant authorities, both in Cyprus and the country of residence, to ensure a smooth visa application and processing procedure.• Translation Assistance: Provide translation support for documents, when required, to facilitate visa application processes.• Consular Support: Assist the Consular officers in various consular activities, such as document legalization, passport renewals, and assistance to Cypriot nationals in the host country.• Record Keeping: Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of visa applications, consular services, and related administrative tasksPublic Relations: Represent the Honorary Consul Office in a professional and courteous manner, fostering positive relationships with visa applicants, local authorities, and other stakeholders
Job Requirement: •	Bachelor’s degree in business administration or a related field; additional qualifications in Office Administration are a plus.• Proven work experience as an Administrative Officer, Administrator, or in a similar role within a Business Chamber or related organization.• Solid knowledge of office procedures, including administrative tasks, document management, and event coordination.• Proficiency in office management software such as MS Office (Word, Excel, and PowerPoint) and familiarity with Google tools.• Basic budget management skills to track project and department spending, ensuring financial efficiency.• Good research and analytical skills to support the Business Chamber's initiatives and strategic decisions.• The ability to prioritize workload and adhere to strict deadlines, ensuring timely completion of tasks and projects.• Outstanding verbal and written communication skills to effectively interact with members, stakeholders, and external partners.• Strong organizational skills with a problem-solving attitude, capable of handling various administrative challenges that may arise.• Keen attention to detail, ensuring accuracy in data entry, record-keeping, and document preparation.

Job Description: Job SummaryAs an Administrative Assistant for the Business Chamber, the role involves playing a crucial part in providing essential support to ensure the efficient operation and smooth functioning of the organization. Take meeting minutes and distribute them to participants afterward. Collaborate with marketing and PR teams as required.Data Entry and Analysis: Enter data accurately into databases and spreadsheets. Help compile data for periodic reports and presentations. Coordinate with relevant teams to gather and analyze data.• Networking and Relationship Building: Foster positive relationships with members, stakeholders, and partners, representing the Business Chamber in a professional manner. Collaborate with relevant departments to strengthen partnerships.• Ad Hoc Support: Provide general support to the executive team and other departments as needed, assisting in special projects or tasks. Coordinate with stakeholders and departments to ensure the successful completion of ad hoc tasks.

job title: Support Manager for Honorary Consul Office
company_name: Belt Road Capital Management (Cambodia) Co., Ltd
position: Support Manager for Honorary Consul Office
Job Description: Job SummaryAs the Support Manager for the Honorary Consul Office of Cyprus, the role involves holding a mid-management level position responsible for overseeing and coordinating administrative operations and support services. The Support Manager will lead a team of administrative officers who will provide essential support to the Consular officers and ensure the efficient functioning of the office. This position is critical in maintaining a high level of service to visa applicants, Cypriot nationals, and other stakeholders, while working closely with the administrative officers to deliver exceptional support and consular services.What you will do •Team Management: Lead and manage a team of administrative officers, providing guidance, training, and performance feedback to ensure the team's effectiveness and productivity.• Visa Application Coordination: Oversee the visa application process, ensuring timely and accurate handling of visa applications, document verification, and submission to the Diplomatic Mission (or Consulate) of Cyprus.• Office Administration: Ensure smooth office operations by coordinating administrative tasks such as managing correspondence, record-keeping, and organizing files related to visa applications and consular services.• Appointment Scheduling: Supervise the appointment scheduling system for visa applicants, ensuring efficient and customer-friendly processes for setting up appointments.• Financial Management: Manage the collection of non-refundable visa fees from applicants and maintain proper documentation and accounting of the collected fees.• Visa Status Updates: Oversee the communication with visa applicants, providing updates on their application status, addressing inquiries, and ensuring excellent customer service.• Liaison with Authorities: Collaborate with relevant authorities, both in Cyprus and the country of residence, to facilitate a smooth visa application and processing procedure.• Quality Assurance: Implement quality control measures to ensure the accuracy and compliance of visa applications and consular services with relevant regulations and guidelines.• Translation Assistance: Coordinate translation support for documents, when required, to facilitate visa application processes.• Consular Support: Provide support to Consular officers in various consular activities, including document legalization, passport renewals, and assistance to Cypriot nationals in the host country.• Record Keeping and Reporting: Maintain comprehensive and up-to-date records of visa applications, consular services, and administrative tasks. Prepare regular reports for management review.• Public Relations: Represent the Honorary Consul Office in a professional and diplomatic manner, fostering positive relationships with visa applicants, local authorities, and other stakeholders.• Process Improvement: Identify opportunities for process improvements and operational efficiency, implementing best practices and innovative solutions to enhance service delivery.
Job Requirement: •	Bachelor’s degree in business administration, International Relations, or a related field is preferred.• Proven experience in a mid-management role within a consular office, embassy, or international organization.• Strong leadership and team management skills, with the ability to motivate and mentor staff.• In-depth knowledge of visa application processes and consular services.• Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written, in English and the local language.• Exceptional organizational and multitasking abilities to handle various responsibilities effectively.• Proficiency in MS Office Suite (Word, Excel, and PowerPoint) and general computer skills.• Strong attention to detail and commitment to maintaining confidentiality.• Diplomatic and customer-oriented approach when dealing with visa applicants and stakeholders.

Company Profile:
Since starting out in 1947, Jaspal Group has substantially diversified from import home linen distribution to a highly diversified textile driven conglomerate with interests in manufacturing, trading, retailing and real estate. The Group is known for a range of products from sophisticated to chic
ranging from men & ladies fashion, bags, fashion accessories to lifestyle home fashion and bedding
products for better living.

One of the most successful companies under Jaspal Group is Jaspal Company Limited, the top leading fashion retail company in Thailand engaging in designing, manufacturing, and marketing of several clothing and accessories brands. With over 2,350 professional staff and a network of 350
shops and corners all over Thailand, the Company has also proclaimed its reputation across Asian markets, as well as other major cities in the world.

Jaspal Group has stepped forward to expand its business to Cambodia under the name of Jaspal Fashions (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. and introduced four stores namely Jelly Bunny, Lyn, Lyn Around and CC-OO to AEON Mall, Phnom Penh. We are now ready to take a new challenge to introduce more stores to AEON Mall 2.

In this occasion, we are pleased to invite the qualified candidates who are passionate about fashion to join us and become a part of the greater success.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mr. Chin Panha  N/A kh-hr@jpsfashions.com Aeon 3 and K-Mall N/A

Job Description:
- Lead sales and marketing activities to achieve his/her unit’s monthly sale targets. 
- Lead, and provide support and decision to team to perform their tasks. 
- Maintain and strengthen the relationship with existing and new dealers, wholesalers, distributers, and consumers. Lead team to visit customers’ location, meeting with customer, call to customer… to close the sales. 
- Ensure all social media are better managed and controlled by teams. 
- Ensure all business lines assigned are doing well and hit through the target; e.g. dealers, wholesalers, distributers, consumers etc. 
- Check and recommend to Head/Chief for stock ordering. 

**Accountabilities 
- Manage and monitor monthly sales and marketing plans to achieve the unit’s targets.  
- Provide day-to-day leadership and management to improve unit’s performance. 
- Ensure members have sound product knowledge and sale technique by provide training to members on regular basis. Coaching, developing, supporting and give Problem-Solving to members. 
- Establish a happy working environment, reduce staff turnover. 
- Checking and making sure sufficient stock are available for sale. 
- Certify excellent overall cleanliness of the showroom to provide customers with exceptional visual presentations and easy-to-navigate in the showroom. 
- Serve as a point of reference to employees in terms of showing great work ethic, habits, personal character, and professional character. 
- Prepare report or information to line managers. 
- Adhere to all organization policies and procedures, be a role model!!  

**Authorities 
- Set and approve annual performance target for team members at the beginning of the year; and meet, review, and propose annual performance grade of team members. 
- Join and decide with HR team in staff interview and selection. 
- Review the documents, requests, mission, commission, sale invoice, quotations… which prepared by team members and submit to line managers for approval. 
- Review and approve sale invoice, quotation based on policy indicated. 
- Review expenses and submit to authorized person for approval. 
- Review and approve Leave request, late clock-in/out… from team. 
- Other authorities as delegated from managements.

- Business Administration or other equivalent; knowledge of digital marketing is preferable. 
- At least 3 years of experiences in Sale and Marketing field. Have a sound knowledge of Sale, Marketing with cosmetic related products is a plus, and management. Integrity is a must! 
- Good communication skills, English and Khmer 
- Good command in Computer literacy in Microsoft office 
- Work independently without close supervision 
- Good communication and convincing skill 
- Willing to acquire new skills in a changing context

Job Description:
**Business Strategy and Plan Development 
- Initiate, develop and update the business strategy for discussion with and seeking an approval from the Board of Directors (BoD) to meet the company’s short and longterm objectives. 
 -Develop, update, and report the business budget plan and actual results for discussion with and seeking an approval from the BoD to meet the company’s desired results. 
- Establish the “Company’s Action Plan” and report its status to the Board to ensure the accomplishment of the actions set. 
Business Strategy and Plan Execution 
- Lead and guide the development of and monitor monthly action plan for each department and pave the way to achieve the company’s target.  
- Provide day-to-day leadership and management to the company to further drive the profitability and sustainability of the company. 
- Analyze deep financial risk and mitigation measures and report to the Board with recommendation of appropriate action to be taken. 
- Analyze the Budget and Actual financial reports, and provide corrective actions to improve business operations to meet its objective. 
- Lead and monitor the implementation of Company Action Plan and report the progress and challenges to the Board quarterly.  
- Lead and promote a working culture of risk awareness and internal control to ensure that business risks are identified and managed timely and effectively. 
- Improve, automate and digitalize the business processes by using a cost-efficient and effective manner.  
- Introduce and strengthen the internal control system to business processes with checking and balancing, the four eyes principle. 
- Maintenance existing strategic partners, customers and other business stakeholders. 


**Leadership and Team Management 
- Lead a culture of integrity, accuracy, responsibility, and high performing culture. 
- Provide direction and support to the management team to hasten their work performance and achieve the company objectives. 
- Build the management team capacity through managing and developing their career paths and expectations. 
- Promote team building spirit for “one company, one team”.
Job Requirement:
- Master of Business Administration or other equivalent qualifications in business management, marketing, and cosmetic skill.  
- At least 10 years of experiences preferably from the Cosmetics background 
including the chief or director level. Have a sound knowledge of business operation, financial, risk management, internal control, Strong administrative skills, attention to details and strong analytical skills, cosmetic or salon skill. Integrity is a must! 
- Good command in communication skills (English and Khmer) 
- Good in cosmetic products and salon skill  
- Good Computer literacy in Microsoft office 
- Work independently without close supervision 
- Good in problem solving, negotiation and analytical skills 
- Ability to work with cross functional teams 
- Good leadership and interpersonal skills  
- Willing to acquire new skills in a changing context

Company Profile: Urban Hub Cambodia is a multi-award-winner and one of Cambodia’s biggest fully licensed real estate developers. -	Install server software

position: ប្រធានក្រុមគ្រប់គ្រងស្ថានីយ -០១ នាក់ (ពេញម៉ោង)
Job Description:
−គ្រប់គ្រងនូវរាល់ការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃរបស់បុគ្គលិកចាក់សាំងដោយប្រកាន់ខ្ជាប់នូវបទបញ្ជារបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន។
−រក្សាសុវត្ថិភាពនិងបរិយាកាសរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់នៅក្នុងស្ថានីយទៅតាមបទបញ្ញត្តិ។
−ត្រួតពិនិត្យទៅលើឧបករណ៍របស់ស្ថានីយស្របទៅតាមកាលវិភាគប្រចាំថ្ងៃដូចជា ទូចាក់សាំង, កាមេរ៉ាសុវត្ថិភាព, ឧបករណ៍ចាប់ផ្សែងបារី។ល។
−ត្រួតពិនិត្យនិងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលបុគ្គលិកចាក់សាំងដើម្បីជួយសម្រួលដល់ការធ្វើដំណើរចេញចូលស្ថានីយរបស់អតិថិជន។
−ធ្វើជាគំរូល្អដល់បុគ្គលិកចាក់សាំងផ្សេងទៀតក្នុងការបម្រើសេវាកម្មជូនអតិថិជន។
−ជួយគ្រប់គ្រងការសម្រួលចរាចរណ៍និងកាត់បន្ថយភាពកកស្ទះនៅក្នុងស្ថានីយ។
−ធ្វើការរាយការណ៍នូវរាល់ព័ត៌មានសំខាន់ៗនិងជួយផ្តល់ជាមិតិយោបល់ក្នុងការកែលម្អផ្នែកណាមួយរបស់ស្ថានីយទៅកាន់ប្រធានគ្រប់គ្រងស្ថានីយ។
− ជួយដោះស្រាយនូវរាល់បញ្ហា និងចម្ងល់របស់អតិថិជន។

Company Profile:
In 2019, AEGIES FUND MANAGEMENT PLC. was registered in Cambodia and obtained the local Securities and Exchange Regulator of Cambodia (SERC) chartered financial license on August 16, 2021. It is a leading independent property and asset management firm. We bring together large local banks, professional trust institutions, the world's top four accountants, and the cooperation of professional law firms, and introduce an experienced Taiwanese investment team to provide global investors with financial products that take into account safety and high returns.
AEGIES FUND MANAGEMENT PLC. is affiliated to HIGH-TEK Group (3202), an OTC company in Taiwan. It continues the Group's mission of "focusing on emerging markets and realizing inclusive finance", and combines the group's resources to create highly competitive fund products, and successfully transfer the group's resource advantages to investors' investment performance.
We focus on minimizing risk, which is the key to maximizing the return of the investment portfolio we set; Therefore, we actively manage various risks. In order to achieve this goal, whether it is the investment team or the internal and external supervision systems of the group have a good and real-time information system and a logistics department that is familiar with laws and regulations and strictly controls risks.

Job Description:
** Assists the Branch Manager in various aspects of branch management to ensure the efficient and effective operation of the branch as follows:
a) Meets with current and potential customers to discuss their financial needs; offers appropriate products and services while developing and expanding account relationships; or refers customers to other Bank departments as appropriate.
b) Jointly establishes quantitative sales objectives, with assigned supervisor, on an annual basis; this activity to be integrated with the office's annual marketing/sales plan.
c) Assists in the proper staffing and training of office personnel; ensures staff is trained in all areas of customer service, including transaction processing, operations, product knowledge, and sales.
d) Assists in managing branch staff to maximize productivity and to achieve sales and referral goals.
e) In the absence of the Branch Manager, makes certain that all office operations are performed accordance with established policies and procedures, either directly or through appropriate supervisor, e.g., office balancing, control of vault cash, etc.
2. Performs duties of a Customer Service Representative.
3. Participates with the Branch Manager in establishing specific goals for the office; implements strategies to achieve these goals.
4. Cooperates with, participates in, and supports the adherence to all internal policies, procedures, and practices in support of risk management.
5. Communicates with the Branch manager, other supervisors, and appropriate staff personal in order to integrate activities.
6. Provides timely reporting to the Branch Manager and other appropriate groups or individuals.
Job Requirement: - Bachelor/Master Degree in Marketing, Finance, Banking, Business Administration or equivalent;- Local Candidate is priority;- Proven track record in delivering high quality results in short time frames;- Possess superior communication and leadership skills;- At least 4 years work experience in banking industry;- Have a sound understanding of the credit operation and supervision will be an added advantage;- High proficiency spoken and written of English.- Creative, dynamic, flexible, self-direct and self-motivated team player;- Committed, hard-working, and honest individual;- Willing to work under pressure.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department HR Manager +855964006845 No 217, Norodom Blvd(St. 41), Sangkat Tonle Basak, Khan Chamkarmorn, Phnom Penh, Kingdom of Cambodia.  +855964006845

job title: Education &Training Senior Officer at AEON 1 (AEON PHNOM PENH)
position: Education &Training Senior Officer at AEON 1 (AEON PHNOM PENH)
Job Description:
Major Duties: 
•	To implement yearly training program plan in store
•	To support oversea training & external training program 
•	To ensure that all members of staff, new and existing, within the department and external, are trained on the application to an appropriate level. 
•	To support conduct new staff orientation program for new store opening
•	To support TNA to create new course right match to current company situation.
•	To maintain effective communication with AEON employees
•	To ensure training provision meets customer requirements and is evaluated appropriately.
•	To provide high quality professional training courses and materials 
•	To acquire feedback on the courses needed for future planning/management information.
•	To facilitate training materials. 
•	To design training materials & certificate that reflects company developments.
•	Keeping & controlling attendance for all staff by each training course
•	To support online learning platform
•	To create company manuals with other related department 
•	To support Best Service Staff, Staff Briefing & Cashier Skill Test..
•	To translate company information or announcement assigned by Manager
•	To assist room booking system. 
•	Other duties will be assigned by Management
Job Requirement:
. Bachelor Degree of Education or relevant field 
. Having at least 2 years experience in training 
•	To provide friendly, courteous and professional service at all times.
•	To maintain good working relationships with colleagues and all other departments
•	To attend training sessions and meetings as and when required

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information Tek Hangnisa (Ms.)  092 888 530/010 804 883 efgcareer@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 092 888 530/010 804 883

Company Profile:
Amret (https://www.amret.com.kh) is a leading microfinance institution established in 1991 that contributes to the economic and social development of Cambodia by providing a wide range of financial services to meet the needs of the large targeted customers. Amret has strong commitment and long-term business strategies to be a leading financial institution in the market by deploying ambitious digital strategies. 

Amret belongs to the Advans international group (www.advansgroup.com) a major shareholder and international shareholder (FMO and IFC). The Advans group serves over 750,000 clients, and has expanded its operations in nine countries such as Cambodia, Cameroon, Ivory Coast, Democratic Republic of Congo, Ghana, Myanmar, Nigeria, Pakistan, and Tunisia. 

Amret has more than 150 branches, located in 25 cities and provinces in Cambodia, and successfully serves 450,000 customers with around 4,000 highly dedicated employees.

Company Profile:
Amret (https://www.amret.com.kh) is a leading microfinance institution established in 1991 that contributes to the economic and social development of Cambodia by providing a wide range of financial services to meet the needs of the large targeted customers. Amret has strong commitment and long-term business strategies to be a leading financial institution in the market by deploying ambitious digital strategies. 

Amret belongs to the Advans international group (www.advansgroup.com) a major shareholder and international shareholder (FMO and IFC). The Advans group serves over 750,000 clients, and has expanded its operations in nine countries such as Cambodia, Cameroon, Ivory Coast, Democratic Republic of Congo, Ghana, Myanmar, Nigeria, Pakistan, and Tunisia. 

Amret has more than 150 branches, located in 25 cities and provinces in Cambodia, and successfully serves 450,000 customers with around 4,000 highly dedicated employees.

Job Description:
Job​ description:
*HR Tasks:
-Support the company's strategic goals which may help drive the design, planning, and implementation of these programs and policies
-Manage and oversee all aspects of HR practice
-Assist and support HR team on recruitment, compensation & benefit, compliance and training& development
-Work closely with top management & other departments to develop HR strategic planning and organizing chart
-Get involved in the HR Information System
-Analyze HR data: why people leave us, whey people stay with us, and why people join us.
-Assist in design or update HR policy such as recruitment, compensation & benefit, compliance and training and development
-Ensure good performance management and performance appraisal
-Identify the weakness and strength of HR Admin Department for betterment
-Present a monthly HR report to middle management and top management
-Do market research on salary-scale and an effective HRM, especially the fastest and most effective recruitment strategy
-Design and update HR policy
-Develop a succession planning of each department and campus
-Perform other relevant tasks assigned by Top Management
*Administrative Tasks
-Attend the meeting as needed
-Ensure the smooth operation of documentation
-Find ways to reduce the administrative cost and save time
-Design and update administrative workflow from time to time
-Run affairs to the relevant ministry directly if needed
-Manage and oversee all aspects of administrative practice
-Corresponding to rental house owners
-Perform other relevant tasks assigned by Top Management
Job Requirement:
Qualification 
-Bachelor's degree in Human Resource Management, Business Administration or related fields. Holding a master degree is appreciated. 
-Having a degree or experiences in pedagogy is applicated.
-At least 4-year experience in HR Admin or related experiences.
-Excellent communication, organizational skills, positive attitude, good time management and leadership and employee development skills
-The ability to work under pressure and with personnel from all levels
-Be patient and able to deal with difficult situations
-Documented computer skills and computer literacy with Ms. Office
-Good command of English
-Good literacy in Mandarin is highly encouraged 
-Self-motivated, friendly, positive attitude, energic, mature, patient, and flexible
-Team work spirit

Job Description: អំពីក្រុមហ៊ុន ៖អឹបេន ហាប់ (ខេមបូឌា) ឯ.ក ជាក្រុមហ៊ុនគ្រប់គ្រងលើគម្រោងអគារសហកម្មសិទ្ធអឹបេន វីលិច ភ្នំពេញ និងការិយាល័យធ្វើការរួម ហ្វេកតូរី ភ្នំពេញ។ យើងកំពុងជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិកដូចខាងក្រោម៖១) សន្តិសុខ (មាន ៣ វេន)៖   - វេន C: ពីម៉ោង ១០ យប់ ដល់ ៦ ព្រឹកអត្ថប្រយោជន៍៖-ទទួលបានប្រាក់ខែគោលសមរម្យ -ទទួលបានប្រាក់អតីតភាព-មានការតម្លើងប្រាក់ខែទៅតាមឆ្នាំ -មានកម្មវិធីជប់លៀងផ្សេងៗ-មើលការខុសត្រូវក្នុងបរិវេណក្រុមហ៊ុន-រក្សាសណ្ដាប់ធ្នាប់ក្នុងខុនដូ-ត្រួតពិនិត្យការចេញចូល	-រក្សាសុវត្ថិភាព -និងមើលការខុសត្រូវលើទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិផ្សេងៗ	ការងារផ្សេងៗដែលដាក់ឲពីថ្នាក់លើ
Job Requirement: - មានអាយុចាប់ពី 18 ដល់ 50 ឆ្នាំ- ចេះអាននិងសរសេរអក្សរខ្មែរបានខ្លះ- មានឬគ្មានបទពិសោធន៍អាចដាក់ពាក្យបាន- មានកាយសម្បទាសមរម្យ និងរឹងមាំ- មានអត្តចរិតស្មោះត្រង់ ឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម និងយកចិត្តទុកដាក់លើការងារ- មានអត្តចរិតស្លូតបូត និងរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់
Company Profile: Urban Hub Cambodia is a multi-award-winner and one of Cambodia’s biggest fully licensed real estate developers. We are committed to developing projects that provide the new generations of Cambodia with exceptional modern living and experience of the first world that focuses on “LIVE, WORK, PLAY” yet preserving the Cambodian tradition and identity of community living.Registered in 2017, Urban Hub Cambodia is a joint venture between a Hong Kong-based conglomerate, Goldfame Group, the largest Hong Kong investor in Cambodia since 1992, and a Cambodian-American real estate company, Urban Living Solutions. Urban Hub Cambodia has quickly become a leading mixed-use property developer and the first developer ever from Cambodia to win the most awards including two major regional awards, “Best Condo Development in Asia 2019” and “Best Co-working Space in Asia 2020” at Asia’s longest-running and most respected property awards organized by PropertyGuru. Urban Hub Cambodia is behind the four most award-winning Cambodian projects both locally and regionally, including Urban Loft, Factory Phnom Penh, Urban Village Phase 1, and Urban Village Phase 2. More projects are expected in the near future.
Contact Info: Contact Information Chao Ang Amrintr  010222019 amrintr.c@villagephnompenh.com Phnom Penh #1159, National Road 2, Phum Preaek Ta Nu, Sangkat Chak Angrae Leu, Khan Mean Chey, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 010222019

company_name: SMALL AND MEDIUM ENTERPRISE BANK OF CAMBODIA (SME)
Job Description: ** JOB OVERVIEW• Ensure maintain branch performance including sustainable growth in loans, deposits, number of customers, productivity, revenue, and profitability• Proactively spot business opportunities, put action plans, and implement marketing activities to capture business and increase market share• Ensure key customers of the branch both loan and deposit are well-serviced and retained through an excellent retention strategy• Direction and supervision of the day-to-day banking operations to ensure that the branch is in compliance with the bank’s rules & regulations, policies & procedures, guidelines and instructions and make recommendations and provide feedback to management.• Proactively identify and address areas of customer dissatisfaction, following up and resolving any customer complaints.• Effectively coaches, trains, lead and empower the team to develop their skills, capacities, and achieve best performance and maintain an open, honest and satisfying teamwork environment.• Embrace, drive, and support changes to improve performance and provide better services/products to customers.• Identify potential process/service enhancements, escalate as appropriate and document suggestions.• Performs other duties and responsibilities as defined by Management.
Job Requirement: • Bachelor’s degree in banking or other related fields.• At least 5 years of experience in business/performance management and branch operations/administration.• Sound sales and negotiation skills.• sense of understanding about the economic environment and impact of country factors on customer’s business as well as the bank• Good organizational and time management skills• Possess high integrity and effective communication• Strong self-motivation and excellent interpersonal skills• Ability to lead and work effectively in a team environment
Contact Info: Contact Information Talent Acquisition Unit HR Manager 093768111 recruitment@smebankcambodia.com.kh MEF Business Development Center, OCIC Street, Khan Chraoy Chongvar, Phnom Penh, Cambodia.  093768111

job title: MED Sales Specialist ( Medical Equipment Solutions)
position: MED Sales Specialist ( Medical Equipment Solutions)
Job Description: -To learn the knowledge of the products and share it to the customers in the purpose of getting the interest and sales to achieve the company’s target and KPI set.-Communicate with the principles on the product knowledge, price, market information, sales & purchase plan and product recall.-Communicate with internal partners including sales admin and other departments to ensure smooth process of purchase, sales and after-sales-service.-To explore the healthcare market and source additional products to expand the product portfolio or suggest the adjustment to the current product portfolio to support the market trend.-Collect market information, analyze data, monitor market status for sales and marketing strategies of the team.-Increase brand awareness of our company and products.-Visit and maintain the relationship with both existing and new customers.-To implement sale strategic plan and perform sales activities.-Attend training or workshops/seminars organized by the principles and our company.-In some cases, provide on-site supports with engineers for the installation and user training, and ensure successful closing the sales orders.-To provide brief daily activities, weekly plan and report to the Business Manager-Manage customers and resolves customer complaints by investigating problems, developing solutions, preparing reports and marking suggestions to management-To perform other related tasks assigned by the Business Manager and HoD.
Job Requirement: -Bachelor’s degree or associate degree in pharmacy, nurse, medicine, sales/marketing, business, or any related fields-Fresh graduate (experience is preferrable)Selling, Negotiation & presentation skill-Good in English speaking, writing, and listening skill (Chinese is a plus)-Customer focus-Conflict management-Fostering collaboration-Communication and interpersonal awarenessWork and Change management-Striving for achievement-Be enthusiastic and able to work in dynamic situation-Initiative, ownership and able to cope with stress.
Company Profile:
The Dynamic Group has been supporting Cambodia's healthcare, agriculture, quality control industries for the last 20s years. Our vision is improving Quality of Life, Shaping Better Tomorrows. With over 400 highly-qualified staffs, the Dynamic Group leads in applying global technologies and delivering value to the various communities that we are serving.

With no fewer than seven companies in its stable, the Dynamic Group brings the world’s latest technological advancements to one of the world’s fastest growing economies.

All of our companies in Dynamic Group are:
-Dynamic Pharma
-Agrotech Vita
-Dynamic Scientific
-Dynamic Distribution
-Dynamic Chemicals
-Dynamic Argon
-Dynamic Technologies

Job Description: MEP Designer (HVAC/Mechanical/Electrical/MEP) position is fully responsible for Design and AutoCAD Drafting Concept, Detail, Construction & Shop Drawings for MEP Projects related to infrastructure projects.- Responsibility includes design and AutoCAD drafting of complete HVAC works including air distribution calculation, duct sizing, duct layout, refrigerant piping, chilled water piping, diffusers / grill sizing etc.  And or;- Responsibility includes drawing and preparation of Plumbing, Drainage & Fire Fighting layout / Composite Shop Drawings including design calculation, piping design etc. And or;- Responsibility includes design and AutoCAD Drafting of complete Electrical works including small power, lighting layout, power layout, fire alarm, fire alarm, telephone, security, CCTV, MATV, lightning protection, and etc.- Responsibility includes preparation of COMBINED SERVICES shop drawings including preparation of HVAC, Plumbing, Drainage, Fire Fighting, Electrical etc., Employee responsibility also includes design works, Quantity take off, preparation of As Built drawings etc.- Fresh Graduate / Bachelor Degree / Diploma in Mechanical / Electrical Engineering- Must be physically capable to conduct field inspections and walk downs which require the following activities: extensive walking in and around a construction site, climbing ladders, climbing scaffolding, climbing in very small and/or confined spaces, and lifting up to 60 lbs.- Knowledge and experience in the planning, design and construction of the MEP systems- Excellent communication and negotiation skill in English- Computer skills required: Microsoft Windows environment, AutoCAD, Revit, Microsoft Office: Word, PowerPoint, Excel, and Google Mail.

Job Description:
- Manage and support Account Receivables (AR) by reviewing AR Aging and collections on daily basis
- Manage and support Account Payables (AP) by reviewing the details AP Invoices against with supporting documents and ensure the completeness, existence, and accuracy of the expenses
- Perform details review on expenses raised by AP team to ensure the correct classification and accuracy of the records
- Coordinate, support, and prepare payment to suppliers (if needed) to make sure that the payments are made by the due date
- Check and review in details on payments and ensure that they are made in accordance with the contract agreement and internal policy
- Review and ensure that all transactions are correctly posted in the system and on timely fashion
- Review and Report AR and AP Balances, cash collections and payments on daily, weekly and monthly basis
- Support AR team and Coordinate with related departments to solve any AR related issues to ensure the collections is by the due date
- Perform bank reconciliation and GL Account reconciliations to ensure the accuracy of the balances
- Perform cost allocation in system on monthly basis
- Review and file monthly and annual tax return and complete E-filing and E-VAT
- Assist Accounting Manager or Head of Finance in preparing accounting policies and procedures
- Lead and support on monthly stock take and report to Finance Manager or Head of Finance
- Review Fixed Assets register, calculate depreciations, and coordinate with related department on fixed assets count
- Coaching and mentoring direct reports
- Other assignments from Finance Manager or Head of Finance.
Job Requirement:
- University graduate, major in Accounting and Finance is preferred
- Pursuing ACCA or completed CAT is a plus
- Minimum of 3 years’ working experiences in related field
- Prior experiences with Borey or real estate is a plus
- Advance in Ms. Excel and experienced with ERP system
- Strong analytical and logical reasoning skills
- Ability to work under pressure
- Strong presentation, written communication, and report-writing skills in English and Khmer

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information RMA CAMBODIA  017888390 recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 017888390

Job Description: 1.承担航班收益任务:负责对所分管航班的收益任务负责,完成公司下达的航班收益指标。2.制定航班控制方案:负责对所分管航班进行市场销售分析、预测,制定最优的航班控制方案,并组织实施和评估。3.航班舱位调控:负责根据市场情况对所分管航班进行团队和散客座位分配、产品定价、以及舱位控制,实现航班收益最大化。4.航班团队控制:负责根据航班情况,进行团队订座、核团、跟踪出票,以及团队旅客服务保障等工作,提高航班总体收益。5.减少航班座位虚耗:负责根据航班情况,及时进行航班超售、混售、以及未出票订座清理,提高航班总体收益。6.航班经营研究与分析:负责对所分管航班的销售数据进行统计、分析,提交航班收益报告,提出航班优化和市场销售的建议。1. Undertaking flight revenue tasks: responsible for the revenue tasks of the flights in charge, and completing theflight revenue indicators issued by the company.2. Formulate flight control plan: Responsible for market analysis and forecast of the flight in charge, formulateoptimal flight control plan, and organize implementation and evaluation.3. Flight class regulation: Responsible for group and individual passenger seat allocation, product pricing, and classcontrol for the flights in charge according to market conditions, so as to maximize flight revenue.4. Flight team control: Responsible for team booking, auditing, tracking and ticketing, and team passenger serviceguarantee according to the flight situation, so as to improve the overall revenue of the flight.5. Reduce wasted flight seats: Responsible for clearing flight overbooking, mixed selling, and unissued seatreservations in a timely manner according to flight conditions to improve overall flight revenue.6. Flight operation research and analysis: Responsible for statistics and analysis of the sales data of the flights incharge, submitting flight revenue reports, and putting forward suggestions on flight optimization and market sales.

Company Profile:
[CAMBODIA AIRWAYS – THE WINGS OF CAMBODIA]
Cambodia Airways Co., Ltd (IATA code KR, ICAO code KME) was registered in Phnom Penh, Cambodia with the registered capital of 200 million US dollars. Cambodia Airways completed the business registration in September 2017 and officially obtained the AOC certificate on July 6th, 2018. Our first commercial flight route between Phnom Penh and Siem Reap was commenced on July 10th, 2018. By the early of November 2019, Cambodia Airways has successfully launched routes from hub in Phnom Penh to Siem Reap & Sihanoukville for domestic flights and to Macao, Fuzhou, Wenzhou, Shenzhen Chengdu and Bangkok for international flights. The Cambodia Airways logo design is inspired by the Angkor Wat temple, which is an iconic structure in Cambodia and the largest monument of its kind in the world. A symbol of the temple appears on the national flag of the Kingdom of Cambodia and we are proud to bear it into the clouds, as representatives of our unique and beautiful nation.

Job Description:
CONSOLE
• DOC checking when received the pre-alert doc from Agent
• Every single word needs o check with MBL-HBL data
• Checking for the cargo connecting info.
• Have created Job No. Cash Invoice, Debit Note, Release Order
• If the shipment needs to collect by Ocean Freight in Phnom Penh, need to issue an Invoice and
follow up with the customer till the payment clears.
• Manifest Checking before submitting the customs manifest.
• If an amendment issue occurs, need to follow up and support the agent /cnee/carrier /in
order to avoid cnee will not face huge penalties with the customs house.
• Have to send ARRIVAL NOTICE by MAIL or by PHONE to the authorized person of cnee.
• Document prepare for Box owner release order and Feeder release order
• Settle the console charges to the respective carrier once the vessel arrives
• Issue the RO to cnee on the ce vessel arrived when cnee presented the relevant doc.
• Have to send shipments status to respective agent.
• Need to follow up till cnee clears the cargo from the port or warehouse. Then, report back the
to agent.
• Check & confirm the data for Console Docs sent from POL.
• Pass to Operation for necessary action

Nomination/Routing Order
• After receiving the Routing order booking from Overseas Network, check the Shipper details
S/C no. and nominated carrier.
• Contact the shipper and get Booking Order and check the cargo ready date
• Then check the validity of S/C no. and get the sailing schedule from carrier
• Provide Booking Advise and schedule to overseas office.
• Also provide a sailing schedule to the shipper. 

CS & Documentation
• Prepare a Booking Note and send it to carriers for cargo space booking.
• Once the carrier accepts the booking, pass information to the shipper for issuing Booking Note at Carrier.
• Monitor & solve the problem for booking & Container release matters between shipper and carrier.
• Check the POD office of the B/L issuing procedure.
• Once the container arrives in CY, request a Shipping Note from the shipper and prepare a draft HBL.
• Prepare Shipping Note and send to the carrier for draft MBL preparation.
• Pass shipment information to the accountant for preparation of Cash Invoice & DN for B/L fee & handling fee.
• Once the shipper confirms the draft HBL, issue Original to the shipper and collect the respective B/L & seal fee.
• To issue MBL from the carrier.
• Send final sailing advice, HBL, MBL & DN for handling fee to the POD office
• Send mother vessel connecting information to shipper.
• Check cargo arrival status with the POD office.
• Assist Accountant for Agent SOA matter.

Import – Export FCL
• Check & confirm HBL & MBL data for POL office to match with Cambodia Inbound-outbound SOP.
• If need to amend, inform POL office for Cambodia Inbound SOP and request to amend before ETA PNH, SIH.
• Once receive the confirmed docs, pass them to operation staff for further process 

DDU shipment Handling
• After receiving shipment information from Operation Dept; get HBL & MBL from the POL Office.
• Check & confirm HBL & MBL data to match with Cambodia Inbound SOP.
• If need to amend, request to amend before ETA PNH, SIH port.
• Once receive the confirmed docs, pass them to Logistics Dept; for further process.

CUSTOMER SERVICE
• Rate filling for both export & import /inland/sea freight/air freight agent inquiry or customer direct.
• DDU/DDP/EX-WORK shipment cargo handling
• After-sales service cargo handling
• Cargo Insurance arrangement
• Problem Solving
• Reporting (Shipment Slip/Summary Report/Network Agent Report)
• DOC filling both exp and import
• All staff need to find new customers & new opportunities as per the company business plan.
Job Requirement: • Education: Bachelor degree• Language: English (must), Thai (would be advantage)• Experience: 3 Years in freight forwarder services• All staff need to find new customers & new opportunities as per the company business plan• Well know customs regulations and road or transport condition• Good at working as a team and optimistic thinking• Can present company services to customers or explanation once they need clarify details• Cross border services (corporate with operation team.)• In-transit services Land-sea, Land-air services.• Monthly Report and report to Dept head and Country managerBenefit• Salary range: 600$ - 700$• Transport Cost• NSSF• Uniform• National holiday follow by Ministry
Company Profile: LOGICAM is distinguished by reliable and cost effective services, innovation in Logistics field, efficiency in every step of the supply chain, which saves clients time and money, a commitment to customizing logistics solutions for clients; and a goal of fostering growth and prosperity, adding value for clients and business partners. Our key’s clients: Makro, SCG, ILS, Thai Nakorn Patana, Big C, Lyyon, S.C Food Products, Global house, Circle K, Sofitel Hotels & Resorts, JWD, Hitachi, Chip Mong Group, PTT, ect.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mr. Ratanak  015 487 776 (Telegram) hr@logicambodia.com Setbou Village, Sangkat Setbou, Krong Ta Khmau, Kandal Province. 015 487 776 (Telegram)

Job Description:
● Post all transactions into the QuickBooks system and review all transactions in Ledger Accounts with the control accounts.
● Assist Finance Manager to perform month-end closing, inventory and general ledger
● Assist in preparation of yearly financial plaining of all the related companies and monitor actual performance against planning.
● Assist in analyses actual production costs and compare to standard cost; reconcile variance reporting of inventory adjustments, labour and production variances;
● Update and check the control accounts (Cash book, bank book, Petty cash summary, account receivable, account payable, fixed assets register, cash advance list, inventory, etc.)
● Ensure AR, AP record accurately in SAP
● Support costing and analysis of new products and cycle count and physical stock
● Maintain fixed asset detail; including adding assets, transferring CIP accounts to active fixed
assets and disposing of assets when needed and reconciling to the general ledger;
● Create and monitor a system of controls, procedures, and forms for the recordation of fixed assets.
● Process supplier invoices such as P.O. matching invoices; GL coding; following up with vendor on price variance, preparing payment and reconciling creditors accounts;
● To ensure the internal control, accounting policies and procedures of companies of the companies are properly followed in order to safeguard the company’s assets.
● Perform bank reconciliation;
● Ensure all inventory is accounted and update into SAP System quarterly
● Prepare and analyses manufacturing P&L; Cost center expenses report; and
● Prepare annual budgeting for manufacturing P&L and cost centers
● Prepare monthly / annual tax returns, payments, necessary paperwork, and reports
● Manage and maintain the company’s tax database (E-Filling)
● Liaise with internal /External auditor /officer
● Other task assign by manager
Job Requirement:
● Degree in Banking and Finance, Business Administration 
or another equivalent field.
● At least 2-3 years of working experience in, accounting & finance, taxation
● Excellent Microsoft office, internet & email.
● Excellent interpersonal, communication and presentation skills
● Strong ability in leadership, networking, teamwork, and problem-solving
● Ability to work independently, as well as in collaboration with others
● Ability to “think outside the box” in identifying problems and implementing solutions
● Works well under pressure, well organised and with strong attention to details
● Ability to multitask and manage tight deadlines
● Be honest, work hard, fast learner and flexible.
Company Profile:
At World International School Cambodia (WISC), our aim is to create an enabling environment for children to maximize their potential in a holistic manner, so that they are an academically, socially and ecologically literate global citizen in our increasingly culturally diverse world.

Your child, as a potential global citizen, will have several educational pathways availed to him or her as a student for WISC to have the opportunity to choose a sought after education pathway to help his or her academic ambitions.

Your child will also be equipped and provided with life skills reflective of the WISC Learner Profile which is developed with the sole purpose of helping your child to be creative, innovative, caring and a responsible young adult, with a fostered inclination to design, innovate, problem solve and communicate effectively.

World International School Cambodia (WISC) in Cambodia offers a comprehensive Singapore Primary Schools Program, combined with the Cambridge’s International General Certificate for Secondary Examination (IGCSE) courses. We look forward to welcoming you to our global community.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR  Department  069 56 56 70 hr@wisc.edu.kh No 11-13, Street 528-281, Sangkat Boeng Kok I, Khan Toul Kork, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 069 56 56 70

job title: មន្រ្តីជំនាញផ្នែកគោលនយោបាយ និងរៀបចំថវិកា
position: មន្រ្តីជំនាញផ្នែកគោលនយោបាយ និងរៀបចំថវិកា
Job Description:
	គុណវុឌ្ឍិទូទៅ
•	មានសញ្ញាបត្រកម្រិតបរិញ្ញាបត្រឡើងទៅផ្នែកសេដ្ឋកិច្ច ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ឬវិស័យប្រហាក់ប្រហែល
•	មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារពាក់ព័ន្ធ យ៉ាងតិច ២ ឆ្នាំ
•	មានចំណេះដឹងផ្នែកភាសាអង់គ្លេសច្បាស់លាស់ ដោយមានពិន្ទុ IELTs យ៉ាងតិច 6.0 ឬសញ្ញាបត្រប្រហាក់-ប្រហែល
•	អាចបំពេញការងារជាក្រុម មានគំនិតច្នៃប្រឌិត និងមានជំនាញទំនាក់ទំនង
•	មានឆន្ទៈ និងការប្តេជ្ញាខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារកែទម្រង់
•	ផ្តល់អាទិភាពចំពោះស្ត្រី ក្នុងការជ្រើសរើសសម្រាប់ទទួលបានតំណែងនេះ
•	ផ្តល់អាទិភាពចំពោះមន្ត្រីរាជការដែលមានក្របខ័ណ្ឌនៅក្នុងក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ឬក្រសួង-ស្ថាប័ន ហើយស្ម័គ្រចិត្តព្យួរការងារដោយរក្សាទុកនូវមុខតំណែង និងប្រាក់បៀវត្ស ប្រាក់បំណាច់មុខងារ និងប្រាក់បំណាច់ផ្សេងនៅអង្គភាពដើម ដើម្បីមកបម្រើការងារពេញម៉ោងនៅ អ.គ.ហ. ។
	ឯកសាភ្ជាប់
បេក្ខជន ឬបេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ សូមមកដាក់ពាក្យសុំចូលបម្រើការងារដោយភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវ៖
•	ប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV)  និង Cover Letter (ជាភាសាអង់គ្លេស) 
•	សញ្ជាបត្របញ្ជាក់ការសិក្សាថតចម្លង លិខិតបញ្ជាក់បទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងឯកសារពាក់ព័ន្ធនានា 
•	ភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយឈ្មោះអ្នកសំអាង (referees)ចំនួនពីររូប សម្រាប់ទាក់ទងសាកសួរពត៌មានដោយមាន (e-mail address, telephone or fax numbers)។
Job Requirement:
	ការដាក់ពាក្យស្នើសុំជ្រើសរើស 
បេក្ខជន/បេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍សូមធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) ដោយបញ្ជាក់ពីជំនាញ បច្ចេកទេស និងបទពិសោធន៍ ដូចដែលមានចែងខាងលើ ព្រមទាំងឯកសារពាក់ព័ន្ធតាមរយៈសារអេឡិចត្រូនិច Email: hr@pfm.gov.kh យ៉ាងយូរបំផុតត្រឹមថ្ងៃអង្គារ ៦កើត ខែស្រាពណ៍ ឆ្នាំថោះ បញ្ចស័ក ព.ស ២៥៦៧ ត្រូវនឹងថ្ងៃទី២២ ខែសីហា ឆ្នាំ២០២៣ វេលាម៉ោង៥ និង ៣០នាទី ល្ងាច។ អ.គ.ហ. ទទួលពាក្យស្នើសុំចុះឈ្មោះចូលបម្រើការងារតាមរយៈ Email តែប៉ុណ្ណោះ។

Job Description: •	Alert the re-order point of inventories and ordering supplies and maintaining suitable inventory levels.•	Forecasting supply and demand to prevent overstocking and running out of stock.•	Checking orders, bills, items received, inventory, and deliveries for accuracy.•	Evaluating vendors and suppliers’ offers and negotiating profitable purchase prices.•	Tracking and coordinating internal stock transfers, as well as resolving delays.•	Maintaining and updating daily weekly monthly yearly records and preparing any support necessary documentation, as well as purchase and pricing reports.•	Other assign by manager.
Job Requirement: ●	At least 1 years of working experience in stock controller●	Computer literacy in Microsoft office applications●	Willing to work flexibly in dynamic and fast-paced environment●	Excellent interpersonal, communication and presentation skills●	Strong ability in leadership, networking, teamwork, and problem-solving●	Ability to work independently, as well as in collaboration with others●	Ability to “think outside the box” in identifying problems and implementing solutions●	Works well under pressure, well organised and with strong attention to details●	Ability to multitask and manage tight deadlines●	Be honest, work hard, fast learner and flexible.
Company Profile:
At World International School Cambodia (WISC), our aim is to create an enabling environment for children to maximize their potential in a holistic manner, so that they are an academically, socially and ecologically literate global citizen in our increasingly culturally diverse world.

Your child, as a potential global citizen, will have several educational pathways availed to him or her as a student for WISC to have the opportunity to choose a sought after education pathway to help his or her academic ambitions.

Your child will also be equipped and provided with life skills reflective of the WISC Learner Profile which is developed with the sole purpose of helping your child to be creative, innovative, caring and a responsible young adult, with a fostered inclination to design, innovate, problem solve and communicate effectively.

World International School Cambodia (WISC) in Cambodia offers a comprehensive Singapore Primary Schools Program, combined with the Cambridge’s International General Certificate for Secondary Examination (IGCSE) courses. We look forward to welcoming you to our global community.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR  Department  069 56 56 70 hr@wisc.edu.kh TUEK L’AK Head Office: Building # 431, Street 230, Sangkat Tuek L’ak III, Khan Toul Kork, Phnom Penh 069 56 56 70

Job Description:
1. Support individual or groups of children within a class.
2. Assist in the implementation of Individual Education Programs for individual or groups of pupils, as directed by the class teacher, and to help monitor their progress
3. Assist in the educational and social development of pupils under the direction and guidance of the Head teacher and class teachers
4. Provide support for individual students inside and outside the classroom to enable them to fully participate in activities
5. Assist class teachers with maintaining student records
6. Support students with emotional or behavioral problems and help develop their social skills.
7. Assist students during lunchtime, toileting and washing activities.
8. Enforce cleanup activities after lunchtime by modeling appropriate behavior.
9. Take care of children during sleeping time in the nap-room.
Job Requirement:
- At least 1 year experiences in Education industry
- Good knowledge in English
- Hard working, motivated, and result-oriented
- A good team player with excellent interpersonal and communication skills
- Confident, organized, and good communication skills
- Highly responsible approach to all tasks
