Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information RMA CAMBODIA  017888390 recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 017888390

job title: Digital Marketing & Business Development Manager, @Female is Priority
position: Digital Marketing & Business Development Manager, @Female is Priority
Job Description:
Job Description:

1. Brainstorms new and creative growth strategies through digital marketing.
2. Identifies trends and insights and optimizes spend and performance based on the insights.
3. Utilize cross-functional approach to develop MAM/OCIC marketing plan and assess activity ROI.
4. Orchestrate successful promotional campaigns, including rebranding of all marketing materials and website development.
5. Create customer pipeline tracking tool from MAM/OCIC owned channels to increase personalized accountability, improve forecasting and track performance versus competition.
6. Analyzing data to identify opportunities for growth in existing markets or development of new markets
7. Develop and implementing strategies to attract new customers, increase brand awareness, and increase loyalty from existing customers
Job Requirement:
Job Requirement:

1. Strong verbal and written communication skills in Khmer and English are preferred
2. In-depth knowledge of various social media platforms, best practices, and website analytics
3. Solid understanding of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript is a plus
4. Highly creative with excellent analytical abilities.
5. Outstanding communication and interpersonal skills.
6. Up-to-date on the latest trends and technologies in digital marketing.
7. Organized in campaign management and detail oriented.
8. Knowledge in social media marketing and CRM is a bonus.
9. Experience with complex data environments, analytics platforms such as Google Analytics is a bonus.

Job Description:
- Exercise due professional care in performing audit work, including reviewing operation efficiency, measuring attainment of objectives, and making recommendations for cost reductions and earnings improvement
- Carry out both financial and operational audit process
- Carry out auditing process, verifying the compliance of policies and procedure of the firm’s operations

- Good English & Chinese is priority.

- Experience in auditing or Audit firm is advantage.

- Fresh graduate and ACCA students are encouraged.

•	Purchase order, follow up with ordering plan.
•	Controlling PA0, high loss item and report to Group manager

We serve several top tier International companies, mostly in the industrial and professional electronic equipment sectors.

Company Profile:
FTB is Cambodia's first and foremost bank. It is a private commercial bank and has been providing customers with safe and reliable banking services for 40 years. 

The Bank was created following Sub-decree No. 1213 dated 10 October 1979 under the former regime of the State of Cambodia. In 2000, the Bank was          separated from the direct management of the National Bank of Cambodia ("the Central Bank") in order to transform its permanent identity into a state-owned commercial bank in Cambodia with the features of a Public Economic Enterprise and with the intention of conducting autonomous business              operations. 

In January 2001, the Bank obtained its banking license from the Central Bank to operate as a commercial bank in the Kingdom of Cambodia for a period of      three years starting from 4 January 2001. This was the first license granted to enable the Bank to operate as a separate legal entity independent from the Central Bank's direct management. On 8 January 2004, the Bank obtained its 2nd banking license from the Central Bank for a period of three years starting    from that date. The Bank now holds a commercial banking license, which was renewed for an indefinite period, on 21 December 2006

On 31 December 2002, the Ministry of Economy and Finance ("MEF") announced, through a Statement of Intent, the privatisation of the Bank as part of the   reform of the financial sector of the Royal Government of Cambodia. On 28 October 2005 the shareholders of the Bank, represented by the Privatisation   Committee, entered into a sales agreement with Canadia Bank and ING Holding Company. The Central Bank sold its 20% shareholding in the Bank and MEF   reduced its 80% shareholding to 10%. In 2009, in accordance with the recommendation of the Central Bank, Canadia Bank reduced its shares from 48% to  15.22% and 2 new private shareholders having respectively a share of 15.39%, entered the capital of FTB. The Bank's Memorandum and Articles of
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department  023862111 hr@ftb.com.kh Phnom Penh Building No. 33 C-D, Tchecoslovaquie Blvd (169), Sangkat Veal Vong, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 023862111

Job Requirement: Skills / Experience:- Bachelor Bachelor’s Degree or MBA in Management, Finance and Banking, or related field- At least 2-3years’ experience related to the said position- Strong customer network and relationship building skills- Initiative, Creative, Flexible, friendly, Honest and Hard Working- Good organizational and time management skills- Ability to respond with teams working, customers, and high commitment- Advanced verbal and written communication skills- Computer literacy and English language proficiency

Company Profile:
Founded in 2016, Wood Work Co., Ltd. is a professional design & manufacture company of customized & built-in wooden board cabinets.
Since the company was founded, Wood Work adheres to the business philosophy of “ Innovation as source, Quality-oriented, Customer first”, gradually builds up the name and spreads out the market share in Cambodia.
Wood Work is the one of the very few company that self-owns the automatic manufacture line in Cambodia with in-house designer & skilled workers, that makes Wood Work has the advantage and strength to do mass production and deliver the end product with confident quality and efficiency. 
With years of practical experiences and firm connections in Cambodia, Wood Work not only devotes itself to pursue the satisfaction from the clients, but also strives for upgrading and diversifying our product and service that to keep abreast of the time and international trend.

Job Description: Main Duties:- Collect deposit from corporate customers and their relevant stakeholders to reach annual target, with sustainable growth for the long run, through implementing effective client retention and new client acquisition strategy.- Servicing corporate customers and top depositors based on Product Policies and procedures of the Foreign Trade Bank of Cambodia.- Build good relationship with potential customers, management and staffs, and public entities at all levels to ensure that the bank’s corporate business operation going smoothly and having strong supportive from them.- Ensure that cross-selling activities, such as loan referral, transfer, and other banking product, is widely implemented during processes.- Assist with Manager, Corporate Deposit Office for enhancing key differentiation and value proposition of the bank’s corporate deposit collection and VIP transactions to ensure customers excellence banking experience.- Improve work quality through well-trained, and keep learning about sales technique, lobbying skills, and business communication.- Participate in developing Corporate Deposit policy, procedures/guidelines and promotion scheme to ensure that the deposit collection activity is effective in accordance with the approved policy and complies with applicable laws and regulations.- Perform other related duties as assigned.

- Control all account duties as needed such revenue and expenses
- Manage and review Account Receivable, Account Payable, and daily receivable
- Ensure that all supporting document and financial document are confidential
- Minimize expenses and ensure that all expenses must attach with reference
- Issue invoices for customers
- Call to inform and follow up customers about payment
- Collect payment from customers
- Ensure transactions are properly recorded timely
- Control and maintains good organize financial files and records
- Monitor and control petty cash on a daily base
- Prepare monthly expense report

- Prepare monthly bank reconcile

- Deal with supply and customer
- Save cost

- work 8 hours per day

- Cambodian only
- University student in accounting, banking, finance and 
  other related field (Year 2 up)
- At least 2-year experience in accounting field
- Good English (Speaking and writing)
- Knowledge of computer skills Microsoft Words, Excel, Power 
  Point, Internet, e-mail.
- High responsibility, honest and good attitude

- Be able to work under pressure

company_name: One Fraternity Co., Ltd. (Vital Premium Water, Mee Chiet)
Job Description:
1. Translate sales strategies into effective sales activities to satisfactorily achieve regional sales KPIs
2. Provide strategic directions to lead regional sales teams to achieve sales target in respective areas
3. Develop distribution model in line with nature of business to ensure high sales performance in the respective regions
4. Develop and conduct customers experience survey and interpret the finding into strategic sales activities 
5. Lead and coach regional sales team to ensure that their capacity and skills are periodically developed 
6. Other tasks assigned by Manager, Group Sales

** Key Challenges 
1. Achieving sales targets in respective region based on approved-annual business plan requires dynamic and accountable teams to effectively perform in their respective territories
2. Expanding sales coverages (Sales and Distribution, HoReCa and Modern Trade) and market require insightful and practical strategy
Job Requirement:
1. Education: 
o Bachelor Degree in Business, Marketing or relevant field
o Specialized courses on sales and/or marketing training are advantage
2. Experiences: 
o Minimum 5 years’ experience in managing sales team
o 3 years-working experience in sales management, preferably in FMCG category or Trading company
3. Skills and knowledge: 
o Project management skill
o Demonstrate good communication skills, and problem solving 
o Advanced MS excel and good knowledge of MS Office
o Strong ability to lead, train and motivate team members
o Demonstrate high quality of report and presentation skill
o Good command of both English and Khmer (Chinese is advantage)
Company Profile: One Fraternity is a Cambodian-owned company specializing in sales, distribution, and marketing of a wide range of consumer products. Since the establishment in 2010, we have extensive experiences and affiliations with diverse stakeholders, including government institutions, businesses, wholesalers, retailers, agents, and customers across Cambodia. Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange, DKSH operates in 36 markets with 32,450 specialists, generating net sales of CHF 10.7 billion in 2020. Founded by Swiss entrepreneurs in 1865, we have been deeply root

Job Description: The International Trade Union Confederation-Asia Pacific (ITUC-AP), a regional federation of trade union centers in Asia and the Pacific region, is implementing a project on increasing the representation of women and youth in trade union leadership. ITUC-AP seeks to recruit a National Project Coordinator (NPC) to assume the overall responsibility for the day-to-day efficient and effective implementation of the project in Cambodia, with a view to ensuring the attainment of its objectives and delivery of stated outputs. The NPC will ensure smooth and cordial relationships with the participating confederations in the country.ResponsibilitiesThe National Project Coordinator (NPC) will:• Coordinate with the affiliates, collect and summarise information/progress updates from the mentors and mentees, and conduct preliminary data analysis vis-a-vis the project indicators• Monitor the progress of affiliates/women/youth trade unionists (WYUs) participation in the project & activities by reviewing, verifying, and analyzing work plans, progress reports, and other related data • Initially check the human face stories developed by WYUs• Facilitate the organization of conferences, seminars, workshops, training sessions, and meetings at the national level• Provide ‘expert advice’ to affiliates in preparing their proposals for national-level activities and ensuring that they align with the project documents/activity plan/budget/indicators• Handle the disbursement process, initial review and collection of finance-related documents, and preparation of mandatory report forms of affiliates-initiated/national-level activities• Coordinate communication and logistics regarding project-related national events
Job Requirement: Qualifications and experience• With a degree preferably in social studies;• Familiarity with trade unions or social issues in Indonesia;• Flexibility and ability to work in a small but international structure;• Willing and able to travel in Southeast Asia;• Excellent English communication skills;• Reliability and ability to work remotely;• Dynamic and well-organized, with an eye for detail;• Good interpersonal skills;• Superior computer skills and ability to web-edit is an asset.Please submit your resume with an application letter no later than 22 August 2023.Only short-listed applicants will be contacted.

Job Description: Job SummaryThe LnD Business Partner works closely with employees and business leaders to identify, design, deliver, develop and evaluate learning solutions that build and enhance individual and organizational capabilities to drive the success and growth of the employees and company.Key Responsibilities 1.	Work closely with line leadership to understand the business and talent pressures in order to identify individual and organizational capability gaps.2.	Collaborate with business leaders and subject matter experts to design, develop, deliver and evaluate learning and development (L&D) solutions so that the business strategy and objectives can be achieved.3.	Ensure the alignment of goals and objectives of the L&D solutions with the goals and needs of individuals and business to maximize individual and organizational performance. 4.	Diagnose and solve individual and organizational performance issues so that the individuals and organizations can achieve their desired performance and growth levels. 5.	Identify capability gaps in employees and manages and propose learning and development solutions to close the gaps and drive performance, development, engagement and retention. 6.	Drive talent development processes (individual development plan, career planning, etc.) to ensure that employees’ level of performance and capabilities meet current and future needs.7.	Support the implementation of learning management system (LMS), platforms, tools and processes to foster learning and high-performance culture.8.	Provide data-driven people and organizational insights so that line leadership team can make informed talent and capability development decisions.9.	Service as a trusted advisor on performance and capability development matters to line leadership so that they are empowered to deal with employee performance and career development issues.10.	Partner with HR Business Partners, HR Shared Services and Community of Practices to deliver great employee and manager experience of L&D services.Key Challenges 1.	Keep employee learning and development needs aligned with business needs2.	Design and deliver engaging and impactful learning and development programs3.	Ensure learning application back on the jobs4.	Balance learning and development program costs and effectiveness

Skills and knowledge: o	Deep expertise in business acumen, talent strategy, organizational effectiveness and data analysiso	Working knowledge of multiple human resource disciplines, including talent development, performance management, organizational development, and etc.o	People skills (broad understanding of human behaviors, motives and/or practical psychology)o	Relationship building, o	Consulting,o	Project management, o	System thinkingo	Coaching and mentoringo	Strong organizational skillso	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.o	Excellent commination and networking skills o	Computer literacy (Microsoft office and other useful software) o	Language: Strong command both Khmer and English

Company Profile:
Hong Lai Huat Group Limited (HLH Group) is a well-established and reputable real estate and property developer with 30 years of successful track record. Established since 1998, the Group has completed numerous projects in Singapore ranging from public and private resident developments, to commercial and industrial building. Some of its notable developments include D’Ecosia, D’s Fresco, D’s Castilia, D’Almira, D’ Lithium, D’Kranji Farm Resort and D’Centenial.

In 2008, the Group diversified into the agriculture sector in Cambodia and had since completed the development of a 10,000 hectares farmland that cultivates cassava, as well as invested in a cassava starch production factory.

The Group also expanded into property development in Cambodia with the development of its first freehold mixed-used project- D’ Seaview, in Sihanouk Ville. One of the largest mixed-use developments in Sihanouk Ville, D’Seaview comprises 737 residential units and 64 commercial units. HLH Group was listed on the Mainboard of the Singapore Exchange on 21st June 2000.

Company Profile:
At World International School Cambodia (WISC), our aim is to create an enabling environment for children to maximize their potential in a holistic manner, so that they are an academically, socially and ecologically literate global citizen in our increasingly culturally diverse world.

Your child, as a potential global citizen, will have several educational pathways availed to him or her as a student for WISC to have the opportunity to choose a sought after education pathway to help his or her academic ambitions.

Your child will also be equipped and provided with life skills reflective of the WISC Learner Profile which is developed with the sole purpose of helping your child to be creative, innovative, caring and a responsible young adult, with a fostered inclination to design, innovate, problem solve and communicate effectively.

World International School Cambodia (WISC) in Cambodia offers a comprehensive Singapore Primary Schools Program, combined with the Cambridge’s International General Certificate for Secondary Examination (IGCSE) courses. We look forward to welcoming you to our global community.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR  Department  069 56 56 70 hr@wisc.edu.kh TUEK L’AK Head Office: Building # 431, Street 230, Sangkat Tuek L’ak III, Khan Toul Kork, Phnom Penh 069 56 56 70

job title: អ្នកជំនាញអប់រំកុមារពិសេស
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: អ្នកជំនាញអប់រំកុមារពិសេស
Job Description: អ្នកជំនាញអប់រំកុមារពិសេស មានភារកិច្ចទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការងារសំខាន់ៗដូចខាងក្រោម៖ក. គ្រប់គ្រងកម្មវិធីរៀន និងបង្រៀនខ. ការងារជំនាញអប់រំពិសេសគ. ការងារគ្រប់គ្រងរដ្ឋបាលឃ. ការងារគ្រប់គ្រងទូទៅង. ការងារប្រាស្រ័យទាក់ទងក្នុងក្រុមច. ការរៀបចំកម្មវិធី និងចាត់ចែងក. គ្រប់គ្រងកម្មវិធីរៀន និងបង្រៀន​  1. បង្កើត និងរៀបចំកម្មវិធីសិក្សាទៅតាមកម្រិត និងបញ្ហារបស់សិស្ស។  2. រៀបចំគ្រូ និងសិស្សទៅតាមកម្រិតថ្នាក់។  3. ពិនិត្យ និងរៀបចំសម្ភារឧបទេសបង្រៀនដល់លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូតាមតម្រូវការ និងការស្នើសុំ។  4. រៀបចំកញ្ចប់សិក្សាទៅតាមតម្រូវការរបស់សិស្ស។  5. ប្រមូល និងពិនិត្យកម្មវិធីសិក្សារបស់គ្រូតាមខែនីមួយៗ។  6. ដោះស្រាយរាល់គ្រប់បញ្ហាសិស្សជាមួយនឹងអ្នកគ្រូបន្ទុកថ្នាក់។  7. ជួបមាតាបិតា ឬអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាលសិស្សទាក់ទងនឹងការអភិវឌ្ឍរបស់សិស្សជាមួយ និងគ្រូបន្ទុកថ្នាក់។  8. ផ្តល់ការប្រឹក្សាដ៏ល្អសម្រាប់បុគ្គលិកអប់រំពិសេស។  9. រក្សាការសម្ងាត់ទាំងសិស្ស និងបុគ្គលិក។  10. តាមដានការបង្រៀនរបស់លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូ និងការរៀនរបស់សិស្សានុសិស្សតាមរយៈការចុះអង្កេតថ្នាក់ និងចុះត្រួតពិនិត្យ (Do ខ. ការងារជំនាញអប់រំពិសេស  1. ចុះអធិការកិច្ច និងវាយតម្លៃលើការបង្រៀនរបស់លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូ និងធ្វើការផ្តល់មតិយោបល់លើការបង្រៀន។  2. រៀបចំដំណើរការប្រជុំក្រុមបច្ចេកទេសបង្រៀនតាមខែនីមួយៗ។  3. ដឹកនាំលោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូរៀបចំ និងអភិវឌ្ឍកម្មវិធីសិក្សាប្រចាំឆ្នាំ។  4. ការចុះសង្តេតខ្លីលើការបង្រៀនរបស់លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូ (Spot Check)។  5. ធ្វើការស្រាវជ្រាវចំណេះដឹងផ្សេងៗដើម្បីអភិវឌ្ឍខ្លួន គុណភាពបង្រៀន និងគុណភាពសិក្សារបស់សិស្ស  ស្របតាមគុណភាពអប់រំនៃបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពរបស់ប្រទេស និងពិភពលោក។  6. ធ្វើកិច្ចតម្រង់ទិសចំពោះបុគ្គលិកថ្មីទាក់ទងនឹងការអប់រំពិសេស។គ. ការងារគ្រប់គ្រងរដ្ឋបាល  1. សម្ភាស និងវាយតម្លៃសិស្សថ្មីដែលចូលរៀននៅសាលាអប់រំពិសេស ព្រមទាំងចេញជារបាយការណ៍។  2. គ្រប់គ្រងលើការងារគ្រូបង្រៀន សិស្សានុសិស្ស និងបុគ្គលិកការិយាល័យសិក្សា។  3. គ្រប់គ្រង និងធ្វើឯកសាររដ្ឋបាលដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធផ្សេងៗរបស់សាលាអប់រំពិសេស។  4. រៀបចំគម្រោងផែនការការងារប្រចាំឆ្នាំសាលាអប់រំពិសេស។  5. ចូលរួមប្រជុំគណៈកម្មការសាលារៀន អន្តរទ្វីប អាមេរិកាំង និងគណៈកម្មការអគារ។  6. ចូលរួមប្រជុំជាមួយគណៈគ្រប់គ្រងសាលា ឬស្ថាប័នផ្សេង ផ្នែកផ្សេងៗតាមការចាត់ចែងរបស់នាយក/នាយិកា ចាងហ្វាង ឬប្រធានសាលារៀន អន្តរទ្វីប អាមេរិកាំង។  7. ចូលរួមប្រជុំរៀបចំផែនការការងារសម្រាប់ឆ្នាំសិក្សាបន្តបន្ទាប់។  8. ត្រួតពិនិត្យការងាររដ្ឋបាលថ្នាក់រៀនរបស់លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូ។  9. បង្កើតទម្រង់វាយតម្លៃសមត្ថភាពសិស្សសម្រាប់ការផ្លាស់ប្តូរកម្រិតថ្នាក់។  10. រៀបចំការប្រជុំបូកសរុបការងារអប់រំប្រចាំខែជាមួយលោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូបន្ទុកថ្នាក់។ឃ. ការងារគ្រប់គ្រងទូទៅ  1.	គ្រប់គ្រងគុណភាពវិន័យ ការបង្រៀន និងរៀន ព្រមទាំងធ្វើឱ្យគុណភាពបរិស្ថានរបស់សាលាល្អជាប្រចាំ។  2. គ្រប់គ្រងការងារដែលខ្លួនទទួលបន្ទុកប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធភាពខ្ពស់។  3. គ្រប់គ្រងកម្មវិធីសិក្សាថ្នាក់អប់រំពិសេសប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធភាពខ្ពស់។  4. រៀបចំគោលដៅ និងបេសកកម្មសម្រាប់ការងារផ្ទាល់ខ្លួន។  5. ធានាលើការងារបង្រៀនរបស់លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូប្រចាំថ្ងៃប្រកបដោយគុណភាព និងប្រសិទ្ធភាពខ្ពស់។  6. សម្របសម្រួលការងារបង្រៀនរបស់លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។  7. រៀបចំ និងត្រួតពិនិត្យការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។  8. វាយតម្លៃលើការងារទូទៅ និងបច្ចេកទេសបង្រៀនរបស់លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រួ។  9. រៀបចំជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិកគ្រូបង្រៀនតាមតម្រូវការរបស់សាលា។  10. សហការ ចូលរួម និងជួយគ្រប់គ្រងរាល់កម្មវិធីផ្សេងៗដែលសាលាតម្រូវឱ្យចូលរួម។ង. ការងារប្រាស្រ័យទាក់ទងក្នុងក្រុម  1. យកចិត្តទុកដាក់ស្តាប់ និងយល់ពីតម្រូវការដៃគូទំនាក់ទំនង។  2. មានភាពរីករាយជាមួយដៃគូទំនាក់ទំនង។  3. បំពេញតម្រូវការដៃគូទំនាក់ទំនងឱ្យបានទាន់ពេលវេលា។  4. យកចិត្តទុកដាក់ឆ្លើយតបជាមួយដៃគូទំនាក់ទំនង។  5. បង្កើតបរិយាកាសល្អជាមួយដៃគូទំនាក់ទំនង។ច. ការរៀបចំកម្មវិធី និងចាត់ចែង  1. ត្រូវរៀបចំផែនការការងារឱ្យមានប្រសិទ្ធភាព តាមប្រតិទិនសាលាដែលបានកំណត់។  2. ចាត់ចែងការងារទៅតាមតួនាទីរបស់ខ្លួន ដោយផ្តល់ព័ត៌មានទៅនាយក/នាយិកាចាងហ្វាង។
Job Requirement:
• មានសញ្ញាបត្រផ្នែកការអប់រំកុមារពិសេស។
• មានបរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឬបរិញ្ញាប្រជាន់ខ្ពស់ លើមុខជំនាញអប់រំ ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ។
• មានចំណេះដឹងលើភាសាបរទេសជាពិសេសលើផ្នែកភាសាអង់គ្លេស។
• មានសមត្ថភាពគ្រប់គ្រងការងារជំនាញអប់រំពិសេស ការងាររដ្ឋបាល។
• មានបទពិសោធគ្រប់គ្រងលើផ្នែកអប់រំយ៉ាងតិច៥ឆ្នាំ។
• មានសមត្ថភាពប្រឹក្សាយោបល់ និងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាសិស្ស បញ្ហាគ្រូ។
• មានចំណេះដឹងផ្នែកចិត្តវិទ្យាគរុកោសល្យ។
• មានចំណេះដឹងខាងផ្នែកព័ត៌មានវិទ្យាប្រើប្រាស់បានលើកម្មវិធី៖ Words, Ms. Excels, Power Point, Internet, and Email.
• មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម។
• មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការដឹកនាំក្រុម៖ ធ្វើផែនការ អនុវត្ត តាមដាន វាយតម្លៃ។
• មានសមត្ថភាពវិភាគស្ថានភាពសិស្ស ៖ ការសិក្សា សុខភាព គ្រួសារ និងសង្គម។
•មានមនសិការជាអ្នកអប់រំ។
• មានភាពសច្ចៈទៀងត្រង់ និងមានទឹកចិត្តស្រលាញ់កុមារ។
• តស៊ូអត់ធ្មត់  សម្របសម្រួល ផ្តួចផ្តើមនិង ច្នៃប្រឌិត។
• គោរពម៉ោងការងារបានទៀងទាត់។
• មានស្វ័យយ័តភាពនៅក្នុងការងារ។
• មានសមត្ថភាពធ្វើការនៅក្រោមសំពាធ។
• គោរពទៅតាមទស្សនវិស័យរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន។
• គោរព និងប្រតិបត្តិតាមបទបញ្ជាផ្ទៃក្នុងរបស់ស្ថាប័ន។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

Job Description: • Pre- Installation Review drawing and material available for site operation• Ensure that tool and equipment are onsite for starting work• Supervise and oversee the direction of the project, ensuring that the client’s specifications and requirements are met• Use new MEP installation methodology, equipment and tools• MEP Installation Undertake final project snagging and prepare list of defects for subcontractor’s action.• Review Contractor’s ‘as built’ drawings Understand of guidelines and procedurefor MEP work installations• Find ways to prevent problems and to solve any that crop up.• Resolve specific site problems as required to minimize program delays• MEP Inspection Prepares daily inspection reports Receive, review, coordinate, track and process RFI’s• Checks installed equipment, materials and workmanship• Review and approve contractor submittals, resolve technical issues arising and ensure compliance with contract requirements.• MEP Testing Perform testing and commissioning activities of MEP project• Perform testing and commissioning activities of MEP project• Review design drawings and highlight commission ability issues to design team and offer solutions• Schedule the final testing and commissioning activities• Manage resources (manpower, tools and materials) required to covering all T&C activities
Job Requirement: • Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering or related subject.• Proficient in computer skills including Auto CAD• Able to analyze financial records and apply data to improved results• In-depth understanding of construction• Able to analyze problems and strategize for better solutions• Communication Skill• Time management and ability to prioritize• Good analytical and problem-solving skills• Able to deal with a variety of people comfortably and pleasantly• Ability to effectively learn and acquire new knowledge and skills• Ability to share knowledge and work in a strong team-oriented environment• Detail-oriented• Good command in written English
Company Profile: At Urbanland, we care deeply about increasing people’s quality of life in Cambodia by creating inspirational spaces for people to live, work and play in. We do so with absolute attention to quality and craftsmanship ever since we began in 2013. We provide a supportive environment for our Urbanland superstars to continuously develop and grow professionally and personally.

Job Description:
- បញ្ចប់ឬកំពុងសិក្សាផ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រផ្នែករដ្ឋបាល
- មានបទពិសោធន៍ជាអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងការិយាល័យសិក្សា ឬជំនួយការ ឬតួនាទីដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ
- មានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ មានសមត្ថភាព អន្តរបុគ្គល
- ជំនាញរៀបចំ និង ភាពជាអ្នកដឹកនាំល្អ
- ស្គាល់ពីនីតិវិធី​គ្រប់គ្រងការិយាល័យ និងគោលការណ៍គណនេយ្យមូលដ្ឋាន
- មានចំណេះដឹងផ្នែក​ MS Office និងកម្មវិធីគ្រប់គ្រងការិយាល័យ ។ល។
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor Degree of Administration
- At least one-year experience
- Proven experience as an office administrator, office assistant or relevant role
- Outstanding communication and interpersonal abilities
- Excellent organizational and leadership skills
- Familiarity with office management procedures and basic accounting principles
- Excellent knowledge of MS Office and office management software (ERP etc.)
- Qualifications in secretarial studies will be an advantage .

Job Description:
o	Customer Service
-	Provide positive customer service (registration and queries)
-	Record of necessary personal and medical information
-	Handle patients’ appointment scheduling
-	Do data entry for proper documentation both on the system and hard copy
-	Handle enquiries; face to face, incoming call, social media or email
-	Liaise with patients regarding medical services
-	Liaise with related departments to ensure that customers receive high standard service
-	Provide escort services for VIPs
-	Handle customer’s complaints, providing appropriate solutions and alternatives within time limits; follow up to ensure resolution
- Participate in customer service development
- Assist with purchasing of various supplies for the medical center
- Handle insurance cases;
-	Contact insurance agent and book their client for physical examination
-	Prepare medical report form for doctors
-	Send medical report to finance for processing claim
-	Submit medical report to finance insurance
-	Check eligibility of insurance cards for OPD direct billing
-	Contact insurance for FOP request
-	Prepare medical health check-up book report send to patients
-	Review their medical health with team doctor and reschedule the follow visit as required
-	Liaise teleconsultation
-	Contact partner clinics for any transfer cases
-Coordinate received information to related departments
-Maintain medial record data base and ensure it is up to date
o Cashier: 
- Estimate the cost of products or services
- Accept payments
- Process sales reports
- Maintain adequate change denominations in the cash drawer and request additional change
- Reconcile cash drawers and sales receipts
- Report issues
- Get deposit from patient before treatment and refunds 
- Accept payments; ensuring all prices are accurate and providing invoices to every patient
- Process patient’s invoice in a timely and accurate manner
- Manage transactions and record into the system
- Fill out and file insurance forms for payment as requested
- Close report daily
- Perform other duties assigned by supervisor
Job Requirement:
•	At least doing Bachelor's degree 
•	Good accounting knowledge
•	Good insurance knowledge
•	Friendly and positive attitude
•	Good commands of English
•	Able to converse in simple Mandarin will be an advantage
•	Computer literacy; MS Word, Excel, Power Point, Email
•	Enthusiastic 
•	Willing to learn
•	Able to work at weekends and public holidays
•	Teamwork and collaboration skills
•	Good communication and interpersonal skills
•	Good customer service skills

* Application Information:

Interested candidates are invited to submit their CV & Cover Letter by using the contact detail. Only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

* Contact Details:

- Contact Name: Singapore Medical Centre (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
- Email:info@sgmc.com.kh
- Website:www.sgmc.com.kh
Company Profile:
Singapore Medical Centre (SGMC) Cambodia was born of a desire to deliver Singapore standards of medical excellence to the people of Cambodia. Founded on the belief that everyone deserves reliable and quality medical care, SGMC focuses on a holistic and wellness approach.

With both the expertise and knowledge to deliver specialized patient care and evidence-based medical treatments, we not only treat and diagnose illnesses, but also give our patients the tools to achieve optimal health and wellness

Job Description:
People Leadership:
• Effective performance management of all direct reports, focusing on behavioral change that will both inspire and motivate individuals to deliver results.
• Responsible for the quality of maintenance work carried out by all indirect employees
• Develop a behavioral safety culture and promote a safe working environment by ensuring full compliance with Carlsberg SH&E and LOTO policy process.
• Recruit, lead, motivate and develop a flexible and agile multi-disciplined maintenance team.
• Carry out leadership led process confirmations, maximizing the opportunity to coach and engage teams during the process.
• Actively support other members of the Senior Management Team
Budgeting & Improvements:
• Prepare, gain approval for and manage annual maintenance budgets
• Prepare, gain approval for and manage annual utilities budgets
• Review maintenance practices, successes & failures with the objective of constantly moving the improvement of cost and performance.
• Analyze and review utilities consumption with the aim of constantly improving supply and operational consumption
• Actively participate in the site/country long term development plan (LDP) formation
• Identify and prepare capital projects for approval and in line with the LDP, which improve operational efficiencies and product profitability.
• Support and where required take the role in managing material and non-material waste and loss reduction, with cross-functional teams.
• Encourage and actively support standardized problem-solving methodologies, including Gemba Kaizen, RCA & EWO activities, to resolve day-to-day and chronic problems.
Performance:
• Prioritize maintenance and utility focus areas
• Ensure clear focus and communication of initiatives that relate to overall business and site targets, through effective policy deployment
• Ensure sufficient resource is allocated to key initiatives (internal or external)
• Drive correct target percentage compliance of autonomous/preventative maintenance through maintenance and operational teams.
• Utilize machine reliability measures of MTBF / MTTR for effective maintenance approaches with defined machine criticality view.
• Sets and communicate clear targets for team
• Ensure utilities consumption targets are part of each operational team targets and that operational teams have a concrete plan to improve
• Review performance through a structured MCRS and PMS system
• Be discipline in terms of meeting attendance and management of these meetings
• Ensure meeting TORs are agreed and adhered to and the plans and action logs are always reviewed according to schedule
Job Requirement:
Professional qualification and competencies:

1. Significant experience and understanding of managing maintenance and utilities KPI and the functional levers relating to people, cost, quality, and service
2. Significant experience and understanding of managing maintenance and utilities within a brewing and packaging environment.
3. In depth knowledge of regulatory requirements relating to Utilities.
4. Committed to Lean TPM and acts as role model in order to achieve organizational objectives through sustainable continuous improvements.
5. High level of Carlsberg leadership competencies:
• Driving for Results
• Customer/Consumer Focus
• Passion and integrity
• Analytical thinking
• Cross-team interacting and

Minimum Qualification Requirement:
1. Qualified to degree level or equivalent in Engineering, Maintenance and/or Utilities or have significant experience and a proven long-term record of managing maintenance and utilities with an FMCG company
2. Knowledge and experience of applying Lean TPM philosophies, tools, and techniques.
3. Knowledge of key

Job Description:
Maintenance 
- Responsible to lead the equipment reliability inclusive maintenance activities at dedicated area as per Maintenance COM
- Responsible for maintenance KPI example OEE, B&D, WO creation & completion, % PM, and total maintenance cost/HL within agreed target
- Responsible for work order (WO) scoping, prioritization, quality of work order detail, distribute of work orders, and the effective follow up and closing out of work orders
- To assign work and manpower scheduling with line responsible through work order system
- To review technician skills matrix and roles from time to time
- Responsible for COM audit with maintenance manager 
- To lead line responsible and communication with production line leader for any production plan and OEE improvement 
- Implement and review WI, SMP & OPL
- To attend daily packaging PMS meeting at related area and escalate breakdown issue during maintenance PMS board
- Weekly meeting with production line leader for maintenance service windows and TBM activities
- Provide and conduct weekly performance evaluation and plan for improvement by RCA or advanced problem solving 
- To carry the overhaul planning, manpower scheduling, spare part list, and review as per COM 
- Troubleshoot and attend for any breakdown even off office hour
- Well maintain all maintenance documents and records system
- To contact OEM for any downtime and spare part detail 
- workshop management

Quality 
- Practice GMP, understand HACCP process and food safety risk
- Apply toolbox hygiene standard and workshop area cleanliness
- To monitor/improve rejection from line within agreed rate which reduce wastage
- Support QC for quality activities

CE 
- Leading and participating in various maintenance improvement project based on Lead TPM
- Ensures ideas of continues improvement are captures
- Update any new ideas into work instructions, OPL and SMP
- Key drive implementation of Lead TPM activities example 5S, Gemba Kaizen, PMS and problem solving at maintenance area
- Support production and maintenance for AM, PM and SMED
Job Requirement:
1. Bachelor/ Engineering degree in mechanical, process engineering, electrical engineering, or relevant areas.
2. Knowledge of maintenance standards and maintenance system
3. English (spoken and written) – an advantage.
4. Willing to learn and drive for results
5. Good interpersonal skill, able to communicate, work together to all level and empowering people
6. Innovative in problem solving
7. Basic technological skill: Microsoft Office software like Excel, Outlook, Word, PowerPoint, and more
8. Able to work under pressure

Job Description:
Strategic purpose of the position:
• Overall responsible for the local procurement organization and the services provided through the local procurement function. 
• To provide best ratio between price, quality and deliveries for all goods and services he/she is responsible for. This requires close cooperation with the Regional VPs, Group Category VPs, Global Category Managers, Category Experts, local CXO, as well as, with other relevant stakeholders in Carlsberg Group's local business units. S/he must ensure that the maximum value is being extracted through sound stakeholder engagement, value propositions to suppliers, robust procedures, and compliance to purchasing policy.

Core Responsibilities:
• Managing senior local stakeholders (CEO, CFO etc.)
• Management reporting to central procurement and local management
• Coordination with central procurement to ensure alignment
• Employee evaluation, development talks, objectives setting
• Local admin tasks (e.g. HR tasks)
• Manage local procurement budget
Job Requirement:
Professional qualification and competencies:

Functional skills:
• Strong knowledge and experience in application of Source-to-Pay Processes 
• General knowledge and experience with spend demand, market and industry analyses
• Thorough knowledge of how to collect and analyse quantitative and qualitative information to assess, screen and select suppliers
• Expert in RFx support, understanding of execution
• General knowledge about TCOs, Supply Chain Management, LEAN tools, CSR as well as e-auction development and execution
• Direct experience with contract planning and execution
• Strong contract negotiations skills
• Experience with Supplier Relationship Management
• Ability to handle claims and to solve related issues
• Thorough knowledge about governance/policies and procedures
• Financial impact understanding 

Other skills: 
• Project management skills both cross functional and cross culture 
• Manage internal customer 
 Able to coach people to continuously develop and motivate
• Able to set up strong and trustful relationship and create inspiring and productive team spirit
• Able to assign tasks to the right people by considering background, skill level, experiences, and potential of people.
• Be role model and provide guidance.
• Able to adjust leadership style to situation and need of people.
• Able to provide clear, open, and honest feedback to drive people and grow them continuously
• Able to consider needs of teams and individuals 
• Able to set objectives and decide on priorities for team and individuals

Educational / minimum requirements:
• Minimum 3 years relevant commercial experience within all aspects of strategic and tactical procurement on regional or global level
• International work experience in related industry
• People Management experience
• A higher theoretical and commercial background, equivalent to a master’s degree

Job Description:
Summary:
The FDT Lead Teacher is responsible for planning, delivering, and assessing lessons in digital technology and computer science to primary and secondary school students. 

The FDT Lead Teacher will also be responsible for developing and maintaining the program’s curriculum.

* Responsibilities:
● Plan and deliver engaging lessons in digital technology and computer science for primary and secondary school students, aligned with the FDT's curriculum and learning objectives.
● Utilize educational technologies and tools effectively to enhance the learning experience and facilitate student engagement
● Foster a positive and inclusive classroom environment where students feel motivated to explore, experiment, and learn.
● Incorporate hands-on activities, project-based learning, and real-world examples to enhance students’ understanding and practical skills.
● Supervise students during lab sessions, ensuring that they are using the equipment safely and effectively.
● Communicate with parents and carers about students' progress, providing them with regular updates and support.
● Collaborate with other teachers and school staff to integrate digital technology and computer science education.
● Attend TKA’s or related professional development activities, to keep up-to-date with the latest developments in ICT education.
● Conducting professional teacher training to public school to ensure effective work continuation.
Job Requirement:
● Bachelor's degree in Education, Computer Science, Digital Technology or a related field. A master’s degree is desirable.
● A relevant teaching qualification
● Familiarity with educational technologies, coding platforms, and tools commonly used in teaching computer science.
● Experience in using a variety of ICT software and hardware
● Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
● Ability to work independently and as part of a team 

* Working Duration and Schedule:
● Working Duration: August 2023 - December 2023
● Working Hours: Monday - Saturday (Morning) , 7:00AM - 5:00PM
● Location: Takeo(Sok An Chambak Bet Meas Secondary School) , Kompong Cham(Angkor Ban School) 

* Benefit
● Training of Trainer (ToT)
● Professional development assistance
● Salary: Attractive salary package (based on qualifications and experience)
● other relevant benefits.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   099 896 669 sereyvathana.aing@techforkids.asia #240, St.271, Phnom Penh 12351. Takeo (Sok An Chambak Bet Meas Secondary School) , Kompong Cham(Angkor Ban School) 099 896 669

Job Description:
• Monitoring and analyzing market trends

Job Description:
1. Handle wet sample preparation to customers
2. Sample panels preparation to requesters
3. Color adjustment of project follow size of TCW Autotint machine
4. Document record of receiving request and releasing sample to customers
5. Demonstration/Mock up supporting
Job Requirement:
1. Handle wet sample preparation to customers	
- Manage product base for tinting as wet sample	
- Manage products as FGs follow request's requirement	
- Tinting sample follow color shade requested	
- Make a list of products/base in stock	
- Record the clear information of each sample such as tinting date, product name, product type, color shade name, project name etc.	
2. Sample panels preparation to requesters	
- Prepare panels sample follow type requested	
- Spraying product on panels follow TDS	
- Inform to requester after finishing	
- Document record when release sample panels	
3. Color adjustment of project follow size of TCW Autotint machine	
- Receive request from requester (Project, Retail, MKT etc.)
- Check shade copare with TOA's catalog or FANDEX
- Tinting color adjuetment follow superior recommendation
- Verify follow size (1/4GL) of TCW Autotint machine after finish tinting color adjustment
- Create formula and release to request after supervisor approve
- Record the clear information of each sample such as tinting date, product name, product type, color shade name, project name etc.
4. Document record of receiving request and releasing sample to customers
- Receive document request from requester
- Review the request and consult with supervisor
- Ask approval from supervisor after finish steps
- Document release to requester
- Document keeping
5. Demonstration/Mock up supporting
- Work as a team to support at jobsite
- Demonstrate/mock up at jobsite
- Support training to applicators at jobsite if supervisor assignment

Job Description: KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES•	Leads the Marketing department, oversees all activities of Marketing team to ensuring proper execution of company plan to deliver objectives •	Supervises Marketing personnel and ensures accurate execution of their duties. Acts as a mentor to key managers and talents to encourage their professional growth, and to ready them for the succession of higher positions in the future.•	Assists Marketing Manager in the development and implementation of Brand Plan and long-term strategy in order to maximize brand performance, brand share, market share, revenue and profitability growth; and spearheads the roll-out-strategy of new expansion along with Sales and Operation teams.•	Leads the creation of Brand guideline, assets, briefs creatives and sources marketing service providers and resources. •	Coordinates the creation of thematic Social Media contents and initiating content marketing campaigns to reach targets•	Builds the business proposal of partnerships for branding and acquisition through affiliate and short-term promotional events•	Optimizes existing growing channels and continuously tests new and crazy campaigns to uncover untapped acquisition•	Manages Marketing budget processes and produces cycle calendar, brand reports, market intelligent reports in a complete, accurate, and timely manner.•	Additionally, plays a leading role in the optimization of Marketing management systems and processes. Handles end to end projects efficiently and effectively.•	Spearhead the development and implementation of Annual and Seasonal Marketing strategy, plan and launch campaigns. •	Drives the development of Above-The-Line and Below-The-Line marketing programs to achieve maximum brand awareness, leverage brand imagery, brand visibility and acquisition within approved budget and timeline•	Executes, monitors, tracks, optimizes and evaluates cycle activities and marketing campaigns to propose improvement plans and execution to deliver company plan objectives.•	Monitors, tracks, and analyses online marketing performance that is KPI driven (Knowledge and Experience in social paid, search marketing, and SEO are required)•	Evaluates and analyses market dynamics, communication channel and key touchpoint performance in order to provide recommendations and solutions to further enhance Marketing performance. This includes a detailed understanding of customer behaviour, utilizing and recommending appropriate market information tools and research to assist in implementing strategy.•	Works closely with other departments to deliver objectives as plan and foster strong team work spirit.•	Works closely across functions and with leadership team to drive Offline and Online Marketing initiatives•	Establishes close working relationships with strategic partners and Marketing agencies in order to gain high levels of supports and loyalty whilst enhancing understanding of the trading environment and industry dynamics.•	Collaborates with relevant stakeholders in ensuring accurate representation and maintenance high level of business integrity in the industry by ensuring compliance with legislation and internal policy.•	Provides Marketing information and reports on performance to ensure that the Chief Operating Officer, Leadership Team and relevant team members are fully informed at all times and take appropriate response actions on a timely basis.•	Understands the market, where we can meet our potential target, acquires new customers, meet business and grow predefined KPIs•	Keeps the Marketing team abreast of changes in the industry inclusive of trade and marketing legislations, regulations and ensures that all Marketing transactions across the business are in legal compliance. •	Conducts research and identifies opportunities for business to continue raising the bar of performance.

Company Profile:
Royal De Heus Group is an international organization with a leading position in the animal feed industry. De Heus was founded in 1911 and has its roots in the Netherlands. After more than a 100 years the company is still owned and managed by the De Heus family.

Since its founding Royal De Heus has expanded from a regional feed company to a feed conglomerate with activities in more than 50 countries in Europe, Asia, Middle East, Africa and Latin America. Due to the rapid growth outside the Netherlands the De Heus Group is a global top-15 feed supplier.

De Heus is establishing their production facility in Cambodia and jointing venture together with TMH Company Limited of Cambodia.

Company Profile:
Established in 2021, Mango Finance PLC is a digital microfinance startup based in Phnom Penh, Cambodia, capitalized by an investment from Vipar Auto FZCO, Dubai. With direct access to over 100,000 customers, we are capturing the opportunity to lend digitally and securely.

Mango Finance PLC intends to transform the microfinance landscape in Cambodia by leveraging the powers of technology and data. We believe in improving access to capital for the unbanked in Cambodia, with our proprietary credit scoring engine.

Mango Finance PLC is a licensed Microfinance Institution, regulated by the National Bank of Cambodia. Please visit www.mangofinance.net for more information.

Company Profile:
Royal De Heus Group is an international organization with a leading position in the animal feed industry. De Heus was founded in 1911 and has its roots in the Netherlands. After more than a 100 years the company is still owned and managed by the De Heus family.

Since its founding Royal De Heus has expanded from a regional feed company to a feed conglomerate with activities in more than 50 countries in Europe, Asia, Middle East, Africa and Latin America. Due to the rapid growth outside the Netherlands the De Heus Group is a global top-15 feed supplier.

company_name: SMALL AND MEDIUM ENTERPRISE BANK OF CAMBODIA (SME)
Job Description: ** JOB OVERVIEWResponsible for checking loan Proposals sent from a branch and compare to the credit policy, client capacity, and collateral value. ** JOB DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES- To monitor the compliance of credit programs and procedures. - To ensure all credit proposals are in compliance with all requirements in relevant policy/regulation- To work closely with the business department and other related teams to ensure the prompt approval process- Check loan applications from a branch that send to HQ for management approval.- Offer support to the place in credit programs, procedures, credit form using and credit documents with own competent area.- Analyze through the repayment sources, loan purposes, and collaterals- Having site visits on collateral locations and interviewing with customers- Write up an independent and sound credit due diligence report for approver making a decision- Produce a brief analytical sheet for each loan application, including:* Business Plan (BP)* Balance Sheet* Income Statement* Cash Flow* Collateral Evaluation* Repayment Capacity …,and then submit to the manager of the credit department for loan approval.- Manages and monitors credit applications of medium loans before submitting to credit manager or committees’ authorities for approval, including:- Manages, observes, and monitors the qualities of medium loans on an appropriate, precise, sufficient, and timely basis. - Manages and controls the requests of small and medium loan that has sent from branches to find out, analyze and evaluate in possible borrowing and give recommendations.- Prepare Credit Committee Meetings and any duties that may be assigned by the bank from time to time.- Act as a strategic business partner in accomplishing the bank’s business goals by jointly develop and implementing plans for new loan products and expansion of lending programs that is competitive in product design and delivery channel to keep abreast with market trend;- Assist in developing and maintaining procedures and reporting tools to provide timely loans report and information that optimize the performance of loan;- Constantly review and analyze the portfolio concentrations to manage the portfolio risk and make recommendations to improve and mitigate the lending risk;- Assist in developing, implementing and maintaining sound loan and credit policies, procedures and guidelines that is in compliance with the relevant Acts, Laws, and Rules of the National Bank of Cambodia, directives and guidelines issued by the regulatory bodies and the Bank’s internal policies and procedures and to ensure the staff adherence to the policies and procedures;People and Organization- Employ, engage, and retain high-quality people. Identify critical talent and succession gaps in the function and develop appropriate plans/strategies to ensure continuity.- Define an organization structure aligned and scaled to the risk control needs of the Bank, balancing regulatory & local requirements as necessary.- Set and monitor job descriptions and objectives for direct reports and provide feedback and rewards in line with their performance against those responsibilities and objectives.
Job Requirement: ** PERSON SPECIFICATION KNOWLEDGE & EXPERIENCES- Knowledgeable in producing reports in computer systems such as Ms. Word and Ms. Excel or Ms. Access.- Understand Credit Program clearly and manage to find mistakes or errors among the Bank.- Ability to work under pressure.- Self-motivation.- Well coordinating and collaborating with colleagues to find errors.- Well communicating with internal and external people especially our client to review loans clearly.- At least 2 years in experience the Credit Field.SKILLS & ABILITIES- Experience in leading and managing a team.- Excellent interpersonal skills.- A strong communicator with excellent written and presentation skills.- Impeccable integrity.- High PC literacy and Data management skills.- Proven analytical and problem-solving skills combined with the ability to identify risks and impacts as well as possible solutions and corrective actions.
Contact Info: Contact Information Talent Acquisition Unit HR Manager 093768111 recruitment@smebankcambodia.com.kh MEF Business Development Center, # S, OCIC Street, Phum Kien Khleang, Sangkat Chraoy Chongvar, Khan Chraoy Chongvar, Phnom Penh 093768111

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 No 30, St. 432, Sangkat Toul Tum Poung I, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

Job Requirement: • មានបរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឬបរិញ្ញាបត្រជាន់ខ្ពស់ លើមុខជំនាញអប់រំ ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ។  • មានសញ្ញាបត្រគរុកោសល្យ ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ។• ចំណេះដឹង ជំនាញ និងបទពិសោធ:• មានបទពិសោធគ្រប់គ្រងលើផ្នែកអប់រំយ៉ាងតិច៥ឆ្នាំ។  • មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការគ្រប់គ្រងលើការងារប្រតិបត្តិដោយភាពឯករាជ្យ ម្ចាស់ការ និងទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់។ • មានគំនិតផ្តួចផ្តើមថ្មីក្នុងការអភិវឌ្ឍសមត្ថភាពគរុកោសល្យ ឬសមត្ថភាពផ្សេងៗទៀតលើផ្នែកអប់រំ។ • មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ ឬចំណេះដឹងផ្នែកបច្ចេកទេសដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធលើកម្មវិធីដូចជា Ms. Offices, Internet, E-mail។ល។ • មានចំណេះដឹងផ្នែកភាសាបរទេសជាពិសេសភាសាអង់គ្លេស។  • មានសមត្ថភាពគ្រប់គ្រង និងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាសិស្ស ឬបញ្ហាគ្រូ។ • មានសមត្ថភាពគ្រប់គ្រង និងធ្វើឯកសាររដ្ឋបាលដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធនៃផ្នែកអប់រំ។ • មានសមត្ថភាពធ្វើការទំនាក់ទំនងប្រកបដោយវិជ្ជាជីវៈ។ • មានសមត្ថភាពស្រាវជ្រាវក្នុងការអភិវឌ្ឍសមត្ថភាពគ្រូ ឬបុគ្គលិក។  សូមភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវ ប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថតបច្ចុប្បន្នភាព 4x6។បេក្ខជន បេក្ខនារីទាំងអស់អាចមកដាក់ពាក្យសុំធ្វើការនៅអគារលេខ223 និង227, មហាវិថីម៉ៅសេទុង ឬតាមរយៈអ៊ីមែល: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh, Website: www.mjqeducation.edu.kh, www.mjqjobs.com, Mengly J. Quach Education PLC, MJQ Jobs, Tel: (855) 12 797 939,
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Phnom Penh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

Job Description:
1- To prepare all accounting documents such as payment voucher, petty cash vouch, official receipt, invoice, etc.
2- To update and check the control accounts (cash book, petty cash summary, account receivable, account payable, fixed assets register, intra accounts, cash advance list, inventory, etc.).
3- To post all transactions into the QuickBooks system and review all the transactions in Ledger Accounts with the control accounts in Spread Sheet.
4- To check and monitor bank transactions and credit facilities and do bank reconciliation.
5- To ensure the internal control, accounting policies and procedures of the companies are properly followed in order to safeguard the company’s assets. 
6- To assist in preparation of monthly fund planning.
7- To assist in preparation of yearly financial planning of all the related companies and monitor the actual performance against planning.
8- To assist in closing accounts and prepare financial statement.
9- To prepare monthly and yearly tax return.
10- To assist in any other accounting activity required or delegated by superior.
11-Other tasks assigned by Director.
Job Requirement:
-	Bachelor’s degree in accounting or related field.
-	Minimum 3 years of experiences in accounting field.
-	Fully understanding Cambodian Taxation Law.
-	Be able to manage multi tasks of accounting and tax.
-	Honest, high commitment and work ethic. 
-	Able to work independently and under pressure to meet dateline. 
-	Good computer knowledge, Word/Advance Excel, E-mails ( outlook )

Dead Line: 10-Sept 2023 by 5 pm.
Interested Applicants should submit CV and Cover Letter to GCLC Office Address as below:
# WG55, Concrete Road, Goup 2,  Toul kork Village, Phnom Penh Cambodia.
Tel: 023 900 586, 023 900 587, Mobile Phone: 070 838 333 or Through the Email: operation@gclc.biz/admin@gclcglobalcargologistics.com.kh
Only short List Candidates will be contacted for interview.

Job Description:
*** Highlight 
•	Sales Support
•	Customer Service Support
•	Sales Administrative

*** Job Purpose:
Responsible for administrative tasks to support the Sales Support & Customer Service team to improve efficiency in a constantly growing and busy work environment. In this role, you will be supporting and administrating the existing team (unless otherwise agreed).

Key Responsibilities:
Customer order management
- Respond to customer inquiries via emails, and follow up with customers about their reservation/order status.
- Create and process orders in a timely manner, review pending orders, and notify customers of upcoming delivery dates.
- Provide alternatives to products with long lead times or low stock to prevent lost sales.
- In charge of learning more about shipping procedures and special paperwork requirements.
- Send a Purchase Requisition to the Purchasing team to order OEM or Skincare products if current stock is insufficient.
- Delete any pending reservations when not needed
Customer service management
- Maintain regular customer contact, before and after-sales support.
- Make daily decisions to resolve customer complaints during ordering and delivery by investigating problems, developing solutions, and submitting suggestions to the manager.
- Provide customers with product and service information
- Identify sales opportunities by understanding customer needs.
Collaboration with internal stakeholders
- Collaborate with the Production Planning and Logistics teams on upcoming requirements, with a focus on supporting on-time delivery.
- Communicate with the Marketing team regarding inaccurate product data entry.
- Communicate with the Design team to answer customers' questions and provide the requested information.
- Liaise with the warehouse to ensure that the quality and quantity of incoming goods meet expectations.
- Request any lead time anticipation from Planning in order to match the customer's delivery time request.
- Collaborate with Finance and Accounting team to resolve issues with Accounts Receivable.
- Provide regular feedback, identify operational issues, suggest process improvements, and communicate ideas to the Operations team.
- Attend meetings with internal stakeholders.

Product knowledge education
- Keep up with new product sales launches
- Maintain an awareness of all product knowledge information
- Maintain current knowledge of department procedures and policies.
- Maintain technical knowledge by attending educational workshops.
Managing administrative duties
- Provide weekly or monthly reports on sales details such as claim/loss, prominent sales, prospective orders on hand, pending orders, etc.
- Track, review, and collect data on customer service and prepare analysis reports as requested by management.
- Update and maintain customer information. 
- Carry out any other duties that may be assigned
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration or related field.
- 2-3 year working experience in Administration, Customer Service, or Sales Background
- Good communication in Khmer, Thai or English. Additional languages spoken is a plus.
- Good computer skills: Microsoft Office
- Service-minded is a must and able to work under pressure.
- Pleasant personality, fast learner, enthusiastic and positive thinking.
- Experience in OEM/ODM, beauty, pharmaceutical, and Nutraceutical is a plus
Company Profile: International Premium Brand related to beauty cosmetics and skincare including food / vitamin supplement, health and wellness- original in Thailand. As we are expertise in this field in Thailand and export oversea in many countries. Expanding the market to Cambodia now is our goal.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR  099995506 info@benovaglobal.com Building 87 (4th Floor), Preah Sihanouk Blvd, Phum 7, Sangkat Chakto Mukh, Doun Penh, Phnom Penh 099995506

Job Description:
•   Enforce rules for behavior and procedures for maintaining order among the students
•   Conducts assigned classes at the times scheduled
•   Assesses the progress and placement of each student in the program
•   Creates an environment for learning through functional and attractive displays, interest centers and exhibits of student's work
•  Participates in and contributes to the teaching profession;
•  Sponsor extracurricular activities such as clubs, student organizations, and academic contests
•  Select, store, order, issue, and inventory classroom equipment, materials, and supplies
•  Enforces regulations concerning student conduct and discipline
•  Prepare students for later grades or levels by encouraging them to explore learning opportunities and to persevere with challenging tasks
•  Assign and grade class work and homework
•  Establish clear objectives for all lessons, units, and projects, and communicate those objectives to students
•  Instruct students individually and in groups, using various teaching methods such as lectures, discussions, and demonstrations.
•  Prepare materials and classrooms for class activities.
•  Observe and evaluate students' performance, behavior, social development, and physical health
•  Perform other tasks assigned by upper manager
Job Requirement:
•  Associate degree / undergraduate in related field
•  Six months to one year work-related experience in teaching
•  Computer literacy: Ms Word, Ms Excel a plus.
•  Good communication, interpersonal, and customer-service skill.
•  Ability to create teaching aids and work well independently as well as part of a team.
. Please attach your certificates.
. Must be currently lived in Cambodia 
Beninites:
.Free Annual Work permit
.Free Annual Visa Extension

Job Description:
Duties and Responsibilities 
-	Monitor instructional and managerial processes to ensure that program activities are related to program outcomes and use findings to take corrective actions.
-	Regularly consult the campus-level committee about planning, operation, supervision, and evaluation of campus education program. Include students and community representatives when appropriate.
-	Provide instructional resources and materials to support teaching staff in accomplishing instructional goals.
-	Provide for two-way communication with superintendent, staff, students, parents, and community.
-	Communicate and promote expectations for high-level performance to staff and students. Recognize excellence and achievement.
-	Ensure the effective and quick resolution of conflicts.
-	Build common vision for school improvement with staff. Direct planning activities and put programs in place with staff to ensure attainment of school’s mission.
-	Identify, analyze, and apply research findings (e.g., effective school correlates) to promote school improvement. 
-	Develop and set annual campus performance objectives for each of the Academic Excellence Indicators using the campus planning process and site-based decision making committee.
-	Develop, maintain, and use information systems and records necessary to show campus progress on performance objectives addressing each Academic Excellence Indicator.
Job Requirement:
Job Requirements 
-	Master’s/Bachelor’s in Education or related fields.
-	Special Knowledge/Skills: 
o	Working knowledge of curriculum and instruction. 
o	Ability to evaluate instructional program and teaching effectiveness.
o	Ability to manage budget and personnel Ability to coordinate campus functions. 
o	Ability to implement policy and procedures Ability to interpret data. 
o	Strong organizational, communication, public relations, and interpersonal skills. 
-	Experience: 
o	Three years experiences as a classroom teacher with additional experience in instructional leadership roles.

-	Email:mesa_ean@arizonschool.edu.kh

Job Description:
• Provide support to Production Manager in collecting and providing all the production data to determine overall and individual performances, estimating and following up the production capacity in lines with the plan, quality of all the related sections and theirs workers and reporting any variances and support Production Manager in developing plans to mitigate the issues.
• Support Production Manager in driving Continuous Improvement projects.

• To comply with the health and safety procedure and regulation during the working time.
• To obey all the machine operation manual, company's facilities maintenance, and protection regulation.
• To find out in advance any equipment and production issues to have soon action plan to prevent any serious problem.
• To develop necessary reports and reporting systems in order to record and save all the production data for productivity / quality/ cost analysis. Use the same data to provide feedbacks to workers about their productivity and to manage various production steps with the aim to ensuring and reporting exactly the section's productivity, production cost as well as quality.
• To work closely with other support functions in particular HR, Engineering, Purchase departments towards developing effective feedback loop with objective of improving effectiveness.
• Support production manager to prepare the target chart for trainees and polishers following the company policy. Record properly the actual stone produced by trainees and polishers, produce the monthly report and submit to production manager and relevant persons as require by the company
• Taking minute of meeting in production or as instruct by manager.

Job Description:
* ENVIRONMENT
• Develop, implement, and maintain environmental management systems in accordance with the Parkas and corporate
requirements.
• Develop procedure and standardize, execute, and maintain the project to meet the environment standard of the company.
• Review, update and improve environmental procedure and waste management.
• Sustainability –Deploy and identify various policies to reduce paper waste, plastic waste carboard, food waste and land field waste by 15-25% reduction in coming year.
• Develop local environmental training programs that meet or exceed the local Prakash, aligned with corporate expectations.
• Coordinate with internal teams to ensure environmental compliance to well implementation in the plant.
• Update legal requirements on environment to corporate.
• Check the level of effect of that legal requirement.
• Report on new legal requirements to management and departments!
• Implement as required by the new regulation or law.

* DOCUMENTS, PROCEDURES AND COMPLIANCE CONTROL
• Make a list of documents in terms of environment, keep track, and update regularly.
• Revoke and manage out of date documents.
• Revisit regularly of policy and procedure to be up to date.

* CONTROL OF CHEMICAL MANAGEMENT
• Update list of chemicals attached with MSDS.
• Draft the instructions for using chemicals and deliver to departments.
• Keep track of chemicals in-out monthly from departments.
• Check periodical health check result of employees contacting chemicals.

* CONTROL OF WASTE MANAGEMETN
• Make stipulations on the classification of waste in the company.
• Check the contractor who is dealing with waste, make a report of checking and proper waste bine keeping.
• Keep track the amount of arising waste daily when waste collection and disposal.
• Ensure of waste handling correctly until final disposal
• Keep track of the number of hazardous wastes that arise monthly, prepare document of hazardous wastes.
• Reckon, collect data of hazardous wastes, make report of hazardous wastes, and submit to Environmental Protection
Department and report to corporate as monthly basis.
• Arrange letter adjusting waste resource owner if changed.
• Keep track and reckon the number of food waste that arises monthly.
• Supervise the daily transportation of canteen waste.
• Ensure the daily weighing waste is handled correctly.
• Ensure of food waste has take out as daily basis as agreed time.
• Wastewater
• Keep track of wastewater data and wastewater discharged condition.

* PATROL OF ENVIRONMENT PROTECTION & OTHER DUTIES
• Check the classification of wastes.
• Check the waste handling and storage by department.
• Check the usage of electricity, water, and paper.
• Check the controlling of chemical and hazardous wastes.
• Control, supervise the damage of sanitation equipment.
• Keep track, supervise the soak pit sanitation of the canteen.
• Blood donation program
• Plastic reduction program
• Other Preventive Program
• Health campaigned.
Job Requirement:
• A bachelor’s degree science related field preferred and 4+ years of experience in a related field.
• Environmental science or environmental management degree and/or management experience preferred
• Excellent communication and listening skills
• Self-confidence
• Thorough understanding of the firm’s business
• Trusted, respected, and recognized as having high integrity.
• Perseverance in investigating alleged noncompliance.
• Strong consultative service skills.
• Must be organized, detail oriented, a self-starter, and able to handle multiple tasks simultaneously
• Strong teamwork skills
• Proficient computer skills in MS Office and Excels
• Ability to maintain confidentiality.

** Working Days: 5 days per week (MON-FRI)
** Other benefits:
- Breakfast and Lunch is provided free
- Holiday Bonus
- Insurance (NSSF and FORTE 24/24)

PHSME Specialized Bank Ltd. was incorporated locally on 21 March 2001 under the laws and regulations of the Kingdom of Cambodia. The Bank was licensed by the National Bank of Cambodia as a Specialized Bank under Parkas B 7-00-05 on 21 March 2001.
